title: Chicken Rolls with Tomato Rice
description: Rinse the chicken cutlets, pat dry, cut in half, sprinkle with ajvar, sprinkle with half the diced peppers and basil. Roll up the cutlets, secure with toothpicks, and season with salt and pepper.

title: Rice for Sushi
description: Put the rice in 250 ml (approximately 1 cup) of water in a pot. Cover and bring to a boil. Simmer on low heat about 15 minutes, until rice swells.

title: Stuffed Pumpkin
description: Hollow out the pumpkin with a spoon, removing the seeds and fibrous pulp.

title: Coconut Rice with Blueberries
description: Remove from heat and stir in rice syrup. Let cool, uncovered, for approximately 15 minutes. Whip cream with soy cream and fold into rice. Rinse blueberries and pat dry. Fold berries into rice, place into bowls and serve.

title: Grilled Cabbage Rolls with Rice
description: Rinse the cabbage leaves, pat dry and cut out the hard midrib wedge. Brush with 2 tablespoons oil and grill leaves on the grill for 2-3 minutes while turning. Then remove.

title: Sushi Maki Rolls
description: Place the sushi rice in a bowl with plenty of cold water and with your hands, agitate the water in a light circular motion 1 to 2 minutes. Drain the water and repeat the procedure until the water is clear. Drain in a colander.

title: Mushroom Risotto
description: Clean mushrooms, cut into smaller pieces. Heat butter in a pan and saute.

title: Vegetable Paella
description: Mix the precooked rice with the cooking liquid into the vegetables. Put in peas and cook while stirring the paella 2 minutes until most of the liquid has evaporated. Stir in olives and season again with pepper. Rinse, halve and slice lemon. Garnish paella with lemon slices and serve hot in the pan. Serve with a hearty red wine.

title: Rice Cream with Berries
description: Add pear juice and let cool. Whip cream. Rinse and dry berries, set aside some strawberries and raspberries for garnishing. Chop the rest of berries and mix with rice. Fold in cream.

title: Basmati Rice with Garden Herb Sauce
description: For the sauce, rinse parsley, shake dry, pluck leaves from the stems and finely chop them. Peel shallot and garlic and finely chop. Rinse chile, cut in half lengthwise, remove the seeds, remove ribs and also finely chop.

title: Seafood Paella
description: Heat 5 tablespoons olive oil in a large, deep frying pan and cook the onion until soft. Put peppers, chicken pieces and meat into pan. Brown all while lightly stirring, season with salt and pepper and add the pressed garlic, tomatoes and 1/2 liter (approximately 2 cups) of broth and simmer uncovered 10 minutes more.

title: Mirabelle Plums and Cherry Cake
description: Separate eggs and combine egg yolks with sugar mixture. Combine sour cherries with quark and rice mixture. Beat egg whites until stiff. Combine cornstarch and baking powder in a sieve and sift over egg whites. Fold egg whites into cherry mixture.
types: ['cake or tart with fruit', 'Cake', 'tart', 'tart', 'Summer Cake', 'Fruit', 'Stone Fruit', 'Rice']

title: Chicken Rice Soup
description: On medium heat, simmer sour cream and cook chicken for another 7 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Stir in the rice. Rinse basil and remove leaves. Serve hot soup garnished with basil.

title: Paella
description: Rinse mussels, peel half of the shrimp.

title: Meatballs with Vegetable Rice
description: For the meatballs: Soak the toast in lukewarm water to soften, squueze dry. Peel and finely chop the shallot and sauté in the butter until translucent. Place in a bowl and mix well with ground meat, egg and bread. If the ground is too soft to shape, add the breadcrumbs until it is easy to shape. Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg. With wet hands form small balls.

title: Stuffed Vine Leaves
description: Blanch the grape leaves briefly in boiling water and drain. Spread on a kitchen towel and cut off the stems.

title: California Roll Sushi
description: Place rice in a rice cooker with 150 ml (approximately 5 ounces) of water and cook at 100°C (approximately 200°F) for approximately 18 minutes while stirring occasionally. Add rice vinegar, heat and stir in salt and sugar.

title: Rice Cakes
description: Separate the eggs. Beat the egg yolks with the sugar until light and fluffy. Beat the egg whites with the salt until stiff. Fold the egg whites into the egg yolk mixture. Sift the flour and add to the mixture. Fold in the nuts. Pour the mixture into the muffin tin and bake for about 25 minutes.

title: Rice Noodles with Pork
description: Rinse scallions, trim and cut diagonally into rings.

title: Sweet and Sour Chicken
description: Cook pasta according to package instructions.

title: Risotto with Radicchio
description: Rinse radicchio and remove outer leaves, cut the rest into strips. Heat butter in a pan and saute radocchio. Add to rice. Grate half of parmesan, add to rice. Season with salt and pepper. Slice remaining parmesan cheese and top risotto before serving with it. Serve.

title: Asparagus Risotto
description: Peel and finely dice shallots. Melt 1 tablespoon butten in a pan then briefly sauté the asparagus pieces, shallots and rice. Mix wine, asparagus stock and broth. Add 2 ladles of water to the rice and boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally.

title: Risotto with Green Vegetables
description: Trim artichoke tops with scissors and remove outer leaves, cut in half lengthwise and sprinkle with lemon juice. Cook in plenty of boiling water for about 7 minutes. Drain. Rinse and dry snow peas.

title: Jambalaya
description: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a saucepan, cook sliced ​​sausage and bacon 5 minutes. Add celery, onions, peppers and the garlic and cook for another 5 minutes, then add the rice and cook briefly and deglaze with chicken broth.

title: Rice Pudding with Berry Compote
description: Combine rice with milk, add remaining vanilla, lemon zest and salt in an overnproof pan. Bring to a boil and cook rice, covered, on low heat for about 10 minutes, stirring. Place, covered, in preheated oven at 120°C (approximately 250°F) for about 40 minutes covered. Combine rice pudding with maple syrup and cinnamon. Place pudding into bowls and top with berry compote. Serve.

title: Fried Rice with Fish and Shiitake
description: Boil rice with almost twice the amount of lightly salted water, cover and let swell over low heat for about 20 minutes. Let cool down.

title: Pineapple-Papaya Rice with Pork Tenderloin
description: Heat clarified butter in a pan, add the pork and cook until browned, turning frequently. Then cover and cook over low heat, turning occasionally, until done, 8-10 minutes (depending on the thickness).

title: Turkey Curry with Savoy Cabbage
description: Cook the rice in water according to package directions, about 20 minutes. Trim cabbage and cut large leaves into small pieces. Heat remaining broth with the apricot jam and lemon juice, add cabbage and sauté over medium heat for 30 minutes. Cut bacon into thin strips and fry in a dry pan.

title: Stuffed Onions
description: Remove the onions from the pot, cut off lids, scoop out and put the hollowed flesh aside. Cook the ground pork then mix in egg, rice and chopped parsley. Season with salt and pepper. Fill the onions with the meat mixture.

title: Saffron Pepper Rice with Meatballs
description: Rinse peppers, halve, remove seeds and ribs and cut into strips. Heat oil in a pan and sauté the peppers in hot oil for 5 minutes. Add peas and cook another 4 minutes, then mix everything with the rice and season with salt and pepper.

title: Thai Noodles with Shrimp, Tofu and Egg
description: Peel garlic and shallot and chop finely.

title: Eggplants Stuffed with Rice and Lamb
description: Season rice with salt, pepper and thyme and add to meat. Blanch tomatoes in hot water, rinse in cold water and peel. Chop 2/3 of tomatoes coarsely and combine with rice and lamb mixture. Chop the rest of tomatoes finely. Rinse and dry scallions. Cut green parts into larger rings, cut the rest into thin rings.

title: Jambalaya
description: Briefly boil the tomatoes, then peel, quarter, core and dice. Put into the pan with the bay leaf and the vegetable stock.

title: Jambalaya
description: Cut the sausage into cubes. Sauté in a deep, hot pan and then remove. Peel the onions and the garlic and finely chop. Rinse the peppers and chile, halve, remove ribs, cut the peppers into pieces and chilli finely. Sauté together with the onions and garlic in the hot pan in sausage fat, stirring for about 5 minutes. Season with a pinch of ground cloves and paprika. Sauté the long grain rice until translucent.

title: Creole Rice
description: Cut the sausage into slices. Sauté in a deep, hot pan and then remove again. Peel the onions and the garlic and finely chop. Rinse, trim and cut into pieces the celery. Rinse the pepper and chile, halve, remove seeds and ribs, cut the pepper into pieces and chile finely. Cook all together in hot oil while stirring for about 5 minutes. Season with a pinch of ground cloves and paprika. Stir in the long grain rice and sauté until translucent.

title: Rice Pudding with Berries
description: Butter four ramekins and sprinkle with sugar.

title: Rice Pilaf with Apricots and Chicken
description: Bring chicken broth to a boil. Reduce heat to low, add chicken, and cook until meat is cooked through, about 15 minutes. Let chicken cool in the broth. Peel onion and carrot. Cut onion into small cubes. Cut carrots into matchsticks. Drain rice in a sieve, rinse with fresh water and let drain.

title: Lamb with Bulgur
description: Cut the flesh into thin strips. Cut core out of the tomato. Scald skin, remove seeds and dice small. Melt the butter in a saucepan and brown the meat briefly.

title: Shrimp Fried Rice
description: Whisk the two eggs in a bowl, then season with salt and pepper.

title: Sweet Risotto with Raspberry Pesto
description: Rinse the orange in hot water, dry, finely grate the zest, and squeeze the juice. Melt the butter in a pot. Add the rice and sauté until translucent. Deglaze with the rum and the orange juice. Pour in a ladle of milk, and stir in the sugar. Slit the vanilla pod lengthwise, and add with the orange zest. Once the liquid has been absorbed, add another ladleful of milk. Repeat the process until the rice is cooked, 20-25 minutes.

title: Risotto with Beans and Mushrooms
description: For the risotto: Add the rice and sauté for 1-2 minutes. Pour in the wine and simmer until evaporated. Pour in some broth and cook, stirring occasionally until the liquid is absorbed. Then pour in more broth and cook the rice in this way for 15-20 minutes until al dente.

title: Spiced Rice Pudding
description: Sprinkle with the almonds and pistachios and serve warm.

title: Vegetable-Rice Bake
description: Rinse, trim and cut the scallions into thin rings. Rinse, trim and cut the summer squash into 1 cm (approximately 1/2 inch) cubes. Rinse the bell peppers, cut in half, remove the seeds and white pith and cut into 1 cm (approximately 1/2 inch) cubes. Thaw the peas.

title: Risotto with Saltimbocca Scallops
description: Peel the onion and chop finely. Add the olive oil and the remaining butter to a heated pot and sauté the onions until translucent. Add rice and sauté briefly. Then deglaze with the white wine. Allow wine to evaporate and add some hot broth to cover the rice grains. Cook, stirring frequently until almost all liquid is absorbed. Continue to add broth in this manner and cook until rice is al dente, 15-20 minutes, stirring frequently. Strain mountain pine butter and add to risotto with Parmesan. Stir and season with salt and pepper.

title: Spicy Rice with Onions
description: Peel onions and slice into rings. Heat butter in a pan and saute on high heat until browned. Add garlic and crushed apple slices. Combine peppercorns and halved cinnamon stick, add to sauce. Rinse and shake dry cilantro, pluck off leaves.

title: Tofu with Rice and Lentils
description: Put the tofu with the soy sauce in a bowl and infuse covered for at least 2 hours. Put the lentils along with the wild rice in a sieve and rinse off thoroughly in cold water. Then cook the brown rice in about 1 liter of salted water until al dente, 35-40 minutes. Stir occasionally and check especially toward the end of the cooking time if possibly some more water should be added.

title: Rice with Tuna Sauce
description: Peel remaining garlic and onion. Chop both as finely as possible. Rinse tomatoes and set about 100 grams (approximately 3.5 ounces) to one side. Quarter the remaining tomatoes. Drain tuna and break into small pieces with a fork. Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a pan, and sauté the anchovies until they disintegrate. Add tuna to the pan and sauté. Rinse thyme, shake dry and finely chop the leaves of two sprigs. Set remaining four thyme sprigs aside for garnish. Add cut tomatoes and thyme to the tuna and simmer over low heat for about 10 minutes. Place 3-4 cubeb berries into a mortar and pound fine. Finish sauce with ground cubeb, salt and lemon juice.

title: Bacalao with Vegetables
description: Peel the onion and garlic and chop finely. Rinse the bell pepper, cut in half, remove the seeds and white membranes and cut into 2-3 cm (approximately 3/4-1 inch) cubes.

title: Omelet and Cucumber Surimi Sushi
description: Boil reserved mushroom soaking water in a pot with mushrooms, sake, sugar and soy sauce, reduce heat and simmer for about 10 minutes. Drain mushrooms, allow to cool and cut into strips.

title: Vegetable Fried Rice with Cabbage, Carrots and Raisins
description: Remove the outer leaves from the cabbage. Cut the cabbage into quarters lengthwise, remove core and cut into strips. Peel the carrots and cut into matchsticks. Rinse the leeks and slice into thin rings.

title: Baked Dumplings
description: In a deep dish, mix 1 egg, salt and pepper.

title: Mushroom and Tofu Stir-Fry with Wild Rice
description: In another pot, boil the rinsed basmati rice with 400 ml of salted water (approximately 1 1/2 cups) and simmer over low heat until swollen.

title: Melon and Prawn Rice Salad
description: covered, on low heat for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.

title: Beef Stir-Fry with Rice Noodles
description: Cook noodles according to package instructions in boiling water for 3 minutes, drain.

title: Risotto with Asparagus and Peas
description: Rinse asparagus, peel lower thirds of stalks, trim ends and cut into bite-size pieces. Rinse zucchini, trim ends and cut into slices.

title: Paella
description: Blanch tomatoes, rinse with cold water, peel, quarter, remove seeds and chop the flesh finely. Rinse peppers, cut in half, remove the seeds and ribs and cut into strips. Rinse fish and shrimp in cold water, pat dry and cut fish into 1 cm cubes.

title: Pineapple Rice Salad with Shrimp
description: Peel the pineapple, remove the core and cut into matchsticks. Stir into the rice. Whisk together the egg yolks, orange zest and juice, lemon juice, coconut milk, curry powder and salt. Slowly drizzle the vegetable oil in while whisking vigorously. Continue whisking until creamy.

title: Baked Rice Pudding with Grapefruit
description: Soak raisins in rum. In a bowl, beat egg yolks with sugar until light. Stir mixture, along with raisins, into the cooled rice pudding. Beat egg whites until stiff, then carefully fold into rice pudding.

title: Hearty Fried Rice with Bell Peppers
description: Mix in cooked rice and sprinkle with fresh marjoram.

title: Radicchio Risotto
description: Rinse and dry radicchio, cut into strips. Add hot broth to rice and cook, stirring frequently, until almost all liquid is absorbed. Continue to add broth in this manner and cook until rice is al dente, about 20 minutes, stirring frequently. Finely grate half of parmesan, slice the rest.

title: Jambalaya
description: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a pan and sauté peppers.  Remove peppers and heat the remaining oil. Add onion, chile pepper, tumeric and rice. Fry briefly, deglaze with broth and cook (covered) over low heat for 15 minutes.

title: Onions with Rice Stuffing
description: Chop remaining uncooked onion finely, sauté in butter. Add rice and cook briefly, then deglaze with white wine. Gradually add the broth while stirring. Clean mushrooms, cut into small pieces and add to rice.

title: Rice Pudding with Prosecco
description: Pour 2 tablespoons prosecco into each of 4 stemmed glasses, then fill up with rice pudding. Garnish with mint leaves and raspberries and serve.

title: Haddock with Bell Pepper Sauce and Rice
description: For the pepper sauce and rice, cut the red bell peppers in half, remove the seeds, rinse and finely chop. Peel onion and chop finely. Sauté onion in butter. Add red bell peppers and cook for 8 minutes. Stir in sour cream simmer 4 minutes and then puree coarsely with an immersion blender.

title: Saffron Risotto
description: Sauté while stirring. Gradually add some broth and bring to a boil, gradually add the remaining broth.

title: Paella
description: Sprinkle chicken thighs with salt. Heat oil in a large skillet and fry chicken thighs on all sides until crispy.

title: Vegetable Fried Rice
description: Rinse peppers, halve, remove the seeds and ribs, and cut into large cubes. Rinse snow peas, pinch back ends and blanch in a little salted water for 4 minutes, drain well.

title: Rice Dumplings with Compote
description: Add beaten egg yolk to rice, mix well and cool. Halve and pit plums. Rinse grapes, halve, remove seeds and bring all fruit with remaining syrup and 2 tablespoons of water to a boil.

title: Corn Bean Salad with Sausage and Rice
description: Meanwhile, combine ketchup, mustard, vinegar, cayenne pepper and sugar. Peel garlic cloves and squeeze through a press. Beat olive oil vigorously into the sauce.

title: Curry Rice Salad with Avocado and Grapefruit
description: Peel avocado, halve and core. Cut avocado pulp into thin strips and sprinkle with juice of half a lemon. Peel grapefruit and carefully remove segments. Rinse chile pepper and cut into fine strips. Slice ham into slightly wider, elongated strips.

title: Meatball Curry
description: Put the rice in a pot with twice as much salt water and the turmeric. Simmer for about 25 minutes. Rinse the spinach, shake dry and pull apart. Mix in just before the rice is done cooking. Season with salt.

title: Risotto with Cabbage and Parmesan
description: Fry the rest of the cabbage in the remaining butter. Season with salt and pepper, then sprinkle on the parsley. Serve the risotto with the fried cabbage and sprinkle with the remaining cheese.

title: Fruit Rice Pudding
description: For the fruits, blanch peaches, rinse in cold water, peel, halve, core and dice finely. Trim strawberries, rinse and cut into small cubes. Mix both with lemon juice, liqueur and vanilla sugar and infuse for about 15 minutes.

title: Turkey Skewers with Risotto with Sweet Potato
description: Peel and rinse the sweet potato and cut lengthwise into finger-sized slices. In a hot pan with 2 tablespoons of oil, fry until golden brown, or for about 10 minutes. During the last 2-3 minutes, sprinkle with the chopped walnuts and season with salt and pepper.

title: Asian Rice
description: Garnish with chives and mushrooms and serve.

title: Rice with Smoked Haddock and Eggs
description: Meanwhile, peel the onion, cut in half then thinly slice. In a hot pan, heat the oil and sauté the onion until golden brown. Add the curry and cook for about 1 minute, stirring. Peel the eggs and cut into pieces. Flake the fish, add to the onion along with the eggs, parsley and cream. Drain the rice, add to the fish mixture and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add the lemon juice and season with salt and pepper.

title: Steamed Rice with Apples
description: Rinse and halve apples, core and cut into thin slices. Heat butter in a pan and saute apple slices for about 3-4 minutes or until soft. Deglaze pan with orange juice and let stand for 5 minutes.

title: Asparagus Risotto
description: Heat olive oil in a pan and fry the shallot in it for 1-2 minutes. Add the arborio rice and the asparagus pieces (without spikes), and saute briefly. Pour the white wine and the poultry broth such that it covers the rice. Gradually pour the broth after 15-20 minutes, with stirring, until the rice is cooked with a light bite and the risotto is creamy. Add the asparagus tips after about 10 minutes.

title: Mexican Bean and Corn Salad
description: Drain the beans and the corn in a colander, rinse thoroughly, and drain well. Rinse the tomatoes, remove the core and seeds, and finely dice. Peel the onion and finely grate. Whisk the onion together with the lime juice, and oil. Season to taste with salt, pepper, and sugar.

title: Eggplants Stuffed with Pork and Rice
description: Rinse the eggplants, trim, cut in half lengthwise and scrape out the pulp, leaving a 1 cm (approximately 1/3 inch) thick shell.

title: Winter Squash Risotto
description: Finely grate the Parmesan. Stir into the risotto with the remaining butter and season with salt and pepper.

title: Chestnut and Pear Risotto
description: While the rice is cooking, rinse the cabbage, pat dry and remove the thick veins. Melt the butter in a skillet and cook the cabbage leaves on both sides. Sprinkle with 1 teaspoon sugar, deglaze with the raspberry vinegar and red wine. Simmer on low until most of the liquid has evaporated.

title: Rice and Tuna Salad with Tomatoes and Lemon Vinaigrette
description: Combine the rice, tomatoes and peppers in a serving bowl. Whisk together the vinegar, lemon juice, oil and sugar, season with salt and pepper then drizzle over the rice salad and toss to combine.

title: Serbian Spiced Pork and Potatoes with Rice
description: Finely chop shallot. In a pan, sauté shallot in butter. Add rice and remaining broth. Cover and simmer over low heat, about 20 minutes. Mix rice with meat and season to taste.

title: Risotto with Scallops and Scallions
description: Meanwhile, rinse the scallops under cold running water, pat dry and cut a diamond-shaped pattern into the scallops with a knife. Sprinkle the scallops with lemon juice and season lightly with salt and pepper. Heat butter in a grill pan and sear the scallops until golden brown, 1-2 minutes per side. Stir the rest of the butter and the Parmesan into the risotto and season with salt and white pepper. Spoon the risotto into bowls and serve, sprinkle with the scallion greens and top with the scallops. Pass the pepper mill.

title: Rice Balls with Salmon Filling
description: Season still hot rice with vinegar, sugar, salt and pepper. Mix well and let cool.

title: Shrimp Fried Rice
description: Whisk together the eggs with the ginger and soy milk. Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large hot pan. Pour in the eggs and let thicken, to create a thin omelet. Slide from the pan and let cool. Cut into thin strips.

title: Stir-Fried Hoisin Duck Breast with Noodles and Vegetables
description: Rinse the duck, pat dry, remove the skin and cut into fine strips. Cut the duck into slices and mix with the hoisin sauce. Rinse the cabbage and cut into strips. Rinse the sprouts and drain. Peel the skin and white pith from the oranges, quarter lengthwise and cut into slices.

title: Pea Risotto with Zucchini and Bacon
description: Rinse and trim zucchini, grate coarsely. After about 10 minutes of cooking, add zucchini and peas to risotto.

title: Lemon Mackerel Risotto
description: Place a round cookie cutter on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and spread a thin, even layer of parmesan into cookie cutter. Remove cookie cutter and repeat to create circles of parmesan. Bake for about 5 minutes until golden brown. Remove, let cool briefly, remove from parchment paper and let cool on a wire rack.

title: Beet Risotto with Smoked Trout
description: Heat oil and 1 tablespoon butter in a pan and sauté the onions until translucent. Add rice and sauté briefly. Add beets and deglaze with red wine. Season with salt and pepper. Add a bit of broth and stir until fully absorbed. Add a bit more broth a repeat. Continue adding broth, little by little until all broth is absorbed. This should take about 15-20 minutes.

title: Rice with Grilled Vegetables
description: Meanwhile, peel onions and cut into wedges. Rinse tomatoes, remove stem and cut into wedges. Mix tomatoes and onions on a baking sheet, drizzle with remaining oil and season with salt and pepper. Place vegetables in the oven and cook under the preheated oven broiler, watching carefully, for 10 minutes.

title: Tilapia in Curry Sauce with Rice Noodles
description: Remove 2 tablespoons of thick upper layer of coconut milk and place in a hot wok. Add remaining curry paste into the wok and cook for 2-3 minutes while stirring. Then add carrot, leeks, shallots, tomatoes and mushrooms, fry briefly and pour in remaining coconut milk. Add tamarind and stir. Let simmer for about 10 minutes until slightly creamy.

title: Cod and Rice Gratin
description: Rinse and finely grate the celery. Peel and grate the carrots. Mix the celery, carrots, creme fraiche, milk, sesame seeds, curry, eggs and season with salt and pepper. Mix in the rice.

title: Saffron Rice with King Prawns
description: Rinse prawns and pat dry. Rinse chile and halve lengthwise, remove seeds and ribs, and finely slice. In a hot pan, fry chile and prawns in remaining oil, 2-3 minutes. Sprinkle with salt and lemon juice.

title: Saffron Lemon Risotto
description: In the springtime, you can add other vegetables like peas and asparagus for more added nutrients!

title: Rice Noodles with Chicken Breast, Green Beans and Capers
description: Cook the rice noodles in boiling salted water according to package instructions. Drain, rinse with cold water and allow to drain.

title: Deep-Fried Cheesy Stuffed Rice Balls
description: Dissolve the saffron in 2 tablespoons of warm water and mix, along with the Parmesan, into the rice. Allow to cool slightly and then stir in the butter and 1 egg.

title: Tomatoes with Rice Stuffing
description: Place the tomatoes in a baking pan brushed with oil.

title: Lucky Rolls with Tofu Omelette
description: Cut tofu into cubes. Beat eggs with a little salt. Fry tofu in hot oil in a frying pan. Pour eggs over and leave for 3-4 minutes on low heat to thicken. Remove the tofu omelet from the pan, let cool and cut into strips.

title: Rice Stew with Vegetables and Chicken
description: Peel onion and chop finely. Peel carrots,cut into quarters lengthwise and cut into bite-sized pieces. Rinse and dry tomatoes, dice into small cubes. Rinse and halve bell peppers, remove seeds and ribs and chop. Heat oil in a large saucepan and saute chicken for about 5-6 minutes. Remove from the pan, wrap in aluminum foil and keep warm in preheated oven at 60°C (approximately 150°F). Saute onion, rice and carrots briefly. Deglaze pan with broth and add cinnamon. Simmer, covered, for about 20-25 minutes. Add peppers and tomatoes about 10 minutes before the end of cooking. Add more water to the pan, if necessary.

title: Rice Noodles with Stir-fried Chicken and Vegetables
description: Rinse beans, trim and blanch in a pot of boiling salted water for 6-8 minutes until al dente. Drain, rinse with cold water and drain again. Rinse cabbage, remove outer leaves and stalk and cut into strips. Peel ginger and cut into thin strips. Rinse scallions, trim, cut green portion diagonally into rings and cut white portion into thin, 4-5 cm (approximately 2 inches) long strips. Rinse zucchini, trim and cut in half lengthwise. Mix chili sauce in a bowl with fish sauce, rice wine, sugar, lime juice and soy sauce. Rinse chicken, pat dry and cut into strips. Heat oil in a wok and saute chicken on all sides with ginger until browned. Push chicken to the side of the wok, add zucchini and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add scallions and sauté briefly, then add chili sauce mixture, add beans and cabbage, mix everything together and saute for 1-2 minutes until done. Mix again before serving.

title: Asian Salmon Pan
description: 90 mins

title: Lamb and Apricot Pilaf
description: Cook the rice according to package directions until al dente. Heat the remaining oil in a skillet and briefly sauté the turmeric, Stir in the rice and saute about 5 minutes. Add the lamb and the apricots, gently mix and season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with parsley and serve.

title: Asian Rice Salad with Pineapple and Spinach
description: 55 mins

title: Rice with Spices, Raisins and Pine Nuts
description: Peel the ginger and finely chop. Stir the chili powder and saffron into 3 tablespoons of warm water and set aside.

title: Stir-Fried Vegetables with Rice
description: Rinse, trim and slice the zucchini. Rinse, trim and cut the leeks into rings. Rinse the green beans, trim the ends and blanch for 6-8 minutes in salted water, then rinse and drain well. Rinse the bell peppers, cut in half, trim and cut into strips. Rinse the tomatoes, remove stems and dice.

title: Indian Vegetable Stew
description: Heat ghee in large saucepan and sauté onions. Add cumin and coriander roots and fry 3-4 minutes until golden brown. Add tomatoes and let simmer for a few minutes until plump. Season with chili, ginger, garlic, turmeric, 2-3 pinches salt and coriander powder. Add potatoes and about 100 ml (approximately 1/2 cup) water, stir and let simmer for about 5 minutes. Add cauliflower, peppers, peas and about 400 ml (approximately 1 1/2 cups) water, cover and simmer for about 20 minutes, while stirring occasionally.

title: Vietnamese Duck Rice Rolls
description: Rinse duck, pat dry and cut the skin into a diamond-shaped design. In a hot pan, fry duck skin-side down until golden brown, about 4-5 minutes. Remove duck from pan and place in the oven with a drip pan underneath. Brush duck skin with hoisin sauce and bake duck in the oven about 30 minutes until cooked through.

title: Red Beans and Rice
description: Rinse the parsley, pat dry, remove the leaves from the stems and finely chop. Season the beans and rice with salt and cayenne pepper to taste. Ladle into bowls and garnish with parsley. Pairs perfectly with tortilla chips.

title: Asian Duck Soup with Rice
description: Meanwhile, trim the bok choy, rinse and cut into individual sheets, cutting smaller as desired. Rinse and halve the eggplants. Trim the pepper, rinse, remove seeds and ribs and cut into thin strips. Rinse the chile, remove seeds and dice small. Rinse the sprouts and drain.

title: Salsify Risotto with Salmon
description: Add the bay leaves, season with salt and pepper and ladle in about 150 ml (approximately 3/4 cup) of hot broth and cook, stirring frequently, until almost all liquid is absorbed. Continue to add broth in this manner and cook until rice is al dente, about 20 minutes, stirring frequently.

title: Orzo Pasta Risotto with Tomatoes
description: Bring broth to a boil, then reduce heat and keep warm. Peel and finely chop onions and garlic. Melt butter in a pan. Add onions and garlic and sauté briefly. Add orzo and a little broth. Simmer, stirring, until broth is almost entirely absorbed. Add broth by cupfuls, stirring, until all broth is absorbed and risotto is creamy, but still al dente.

title: Tomato Soup with Rice and Lemongrass
description: Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a saucepan and sauté shallot, garlic and lemongrass pieces. Add tomatoes and tomato paste. Add broth and a pinch of sugar. Season with salt and pepper. Simmer for 20-25 minutes on medium heat. Puree soup and strain through a fine sieve.

title: Risotto with Clams and Mussels
description: Rinse the mussels and clams and debeard. Discard any that are open.

title: Summer Risotto
description: Mix the butter and parmesan into the risotto and season to taste with salt and pepper.

title: Fried Rice with Vegetables and Crabmeat
description: Thaw the peas. Peel the onion and cut into very fine strips. Cut the crabmeat into small cubes. In a large pan, heat the oil and fry the rice, stirring occasionally.

title: Risotto Cheese Balls
description: Stir in 2 teaspoons butter, then remove from the heat, stir in the Parmesan and season with salt and pepper. Let rice rest for about 20 minutes until it has cooled somewhat, then stir in whole egg.

title: Spanish Paella
description: Blanch the tomatoes, rinse with cold water, peel, quarter and cut into pieces. Rinse the scallions, trim, shake dry and cut diagonally into rings. Heat the oil in a large, high-sided pan and sauté the scallions and bell pepper. Add the rice, deglaze with the wine, add the broth, stir in the saffron and cook everything over medium heat for 20-25 minutes.

title: Rice Salad with Crabmeat
description: Peel and finely chop garlic, whisk with honey, lime juice and oil. Season to taste with sea salt and cayenne pepper. Combine rice, crabmeat and vegetables and toss salad with the dressing. Serve on lettuce leaves.

title: Pea Risotto with Asparagus and Ham
description: Thaw the peas. Rinse the herbs, shake dry, pluck off the leaves, and cut into large strips. Cut the ham into small strips. Peel and finely chop the shallot and sauté until translucent in a pot with hot oil.

title: Risotto with Shrimp and Porcini Mushrooms
description: Peel and finely dice the shallot and garlic.

title: Spicy Lamb Curry with Saffron Rice and Papadums
description: For the papadums: In a small bowl, crumble the yeast into 125 ml (approximately 1/2 cup) of lukewarm water and let stand until foamy. In a bowl, stir together the flour, salt and 3 tablespoons of olive oil. Add the yeast and knead in the bowl until dough is smooth and pulls away from the sides of the bowl. Cover and let stand in a warm draft-free spot until doubled in volume, about 1 hour.

title: Chicken Soup with Rice Noodles
description: Remove the chicken from the cooking liquid and let cool. Discard the skin, remove the meat from the bones and tear meat into bite-sized pieces. Peel the carrots, cut into thirds and cut into fine strips. Rinse the chives, shake dry and finely chop. Halve the leek, rinse under running water, shake dry and chop only the white part into narrow rings.

title: Grilled Peppers with Rice Stuffing
description: Cook rice according to package instructions until al dente.

title: Rice Timbales with Duck Breast
description: Peel the carrot, shallot and garlic and cut into small cubes. Rinse celery and cut into small cubes.

title: Risotto with Chanterelles
description: Bring broth to a boil in a small pot, then reduce heat and keep warm. Heat oil in a pot over medium heat and sauté onion and garlic until translucent. Stir in chanterelles and porcini powder. Stir in rice. Ladle in about 150 ml (approximately 3/4 cup) of hot broth and cook stirring frequently, until almost all liquid is absorbed. Continue to add broth in this manner and cook until rice is al dente, about 20 minutes, stirring frequently.

title: Hungarian Stuffed Peppers with Rice
description: Meanwhile, peel 1 onion and 2 cloves of garlic and chop finely. Rinse the parsley, shake dry, pluck off the leaves and chop finely.

title: Mediterranean Style Rice Salad with Pistachios
description: Cut pomegranate in half. Press pomegranate halves outward and remove seeds carefully to avoid splashing. Rinse orange in hot water, wipe dry and grate orange skin. Peel orange carefully and cut out orange segments between membranes carefully collecting the orange juice in a bowl. Chop orange segments. Combine orange juice with oil. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Tomatoes Stuffed with Ground Meat and Rice
description: Preheat the oven to 180°C (approximately 350°F) convection.

title: Marinated Prawns with Snow Peas and Rice
description: Rinse rice in a sieve, combine with two parts of water, season with salt and bring to a boil. Cover and simmer on low heat for about 20 minutes.

title: Rice Noodles with Chicken and Broccoli
description: Rinse broccoli and bok choy and pat dry. Coarsely chop the bok choy.

title: Barley and Brown Rice Salad with Apples
description: Meanwhile, rinse the apples, quarter, remove cores, cut 1 apple into small cubes and 1 apple into narrow slices. Mix both with lemon juice.

title: Risotto Cakes with Parsley Pesto
description: For the pesto, rinse the parsley, shake dry and pluck off the leaves. Finely chop. Peel the garlic and finely chop along with the almonds. Mix with the parsley and the oil and season with salt.

title: Fried Risotto Balls
description: Meanwhile, rinse the basil, shake dry and finely chop the leaves. Chop the olives and mix with the basil into the risotto. Shape the mixture into small balls, then press into flat patties, coat in breadcrumbs and fry in a pan in hot oil until golden brown. Serve immediately.
types: ['Rice', 'skillet dish', 'Side Dish', 'Rice Side Dish', 'hearty side dish', 'veggie burger']

title: Vegetable Gratin with Ham
description: Serve sprinkled with fresh snipped chives.

title: Fried Rice with Cashews and Vegetables
description: Without adding any oil, toast cashew nuts in a pan until golden brown, remove and set aside. In a wok, heat oil and sauté the onion strips. Add tomato and cooked rice, mixing well. Add soy sauce, oyster sauce and some rice vinegar. Season with pepper and stir in the cashews and cilantro. Serve in bowls.

title: Poached Chicken with Rice Noodles and Pineapple
description: Rinse chile peppers, cut in half lengthwise, remove the seeds and cut the flesh into thin strips. Mix 3 tablespoons soy sauce and the honey, stir in chile peppers and coat chicken breasts with marinade. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes.

title: Broth with Rice Noodles and Cilantro
description: Rinse the leeks and cut into thin rings. Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large pot, sauté the leek about 2 minutes, deglaze with the broth and cook for 3 minutes. Add the rice noodles and cook 8-10 more minutes. Season with lime juice and soy sauce. Pour into a small bowl and serve garnished with chopped chile pepper and cilantro leaves.

title: Risotto with Parsley and Pine Nuts
description: Meanwhile, toast pine nuts in a dry skillet until golden brown. Add Parmesan and chopped parsley to risotto. Season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with toasted pine nuts.

title: Black Bean Rice with Shrimp
description: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a deep frying pan, fry chicken over high heat for 3-4 minutes, sprinkle with 1 tablespoon lime juice and remove from pan. Heat 1 tablespoon oil in the pan, fry shrimp over high heat for 3 minutes and season with chile peppers and drizzle 1 tablespoon lime juice.

title: Mixed Fruit Jelly with Lemony Rice Pudding and Pine Nuts
description: Finely grate the lemon zest and squeeze the juice. Bring the milk to a boil along with the lemon zest and honey. Add the rice, cover and let simmer for about 20 minutes over low heat, stirring occasionally. Season with the lemon juice and spoon into serving glasses.

title: Sweet Coconut Sushi Rice with Fruit
description: Meanwhile, rinse, hull and cut strawberries into thin slices. Halve the papaya and remove the seeds. Cut the flesh into thin slices.

title: Asian-Style Pork on Rice Noodles
description: Peel garlic and chop finely. Rinse, peel and cut the ginger into thin strips. Halve the chile pepper, remove the seeds and finely chop.  Heat the oil in a wok or large deep skillet, add the meat, garlic and chile pepper and cook 1-2 minutes.

title: Stuffed Tomatoes
description: Heat olive oil in a small saucepan and sauté the shallots with the garlic until soft. Add the tomato paste, cook briefly, add the rice and deglaze with the white wine. Add chicken broth and the scooped tomato interiors and simmer for 20-25 minutes over low heat.

title: Tuna Sashimi with Green Tea Rice
description: Heat rice vinegar with the remaining 50 ml (approximately 1/4 cup) of the green tea, salt, and sugar. Fill a bowl with the rice and remove the seaweed. Pull chopsticks through the rice while slowly pouring the vinegar mixture into it. Simultaneously fan the rice, so that it cools slightly and develops a glossy shine. Cut the nori into very fine strips. Rinse the scallion and cut diagonally into thin strips or rings.

title: Bacon-Wrapped Chicken Thighs with Saffron Rice
description: Rinse the chicken thighs and pat dry. Remove bones and season with pepper. Wrap the chicken in the slices of bacon. Secure with toothpicks and saute on all sides in a skillet in hot oil over medium heat. Deglaze with some water and cook covered over low heat until done, about 10 minutes.

title: Brown Rice Salad with Vegetables
description: Rinse peppers, dry, halve and remove seeds and ribs.  Cut yellow pepper into cubes. Cut green and red peppers into quarters. Cut 3 quarters of red and green peppers into cubes. Cut the remaining 2 quarters into smaller cubes for garnishing. Peel carrots, halve lengthwise and cut into cubes. Rinse, halve and seed tomatoes. Cut tomato flesh into cubes. Rinse and dry zucchini and cut into cubes. Rinse and dry scallions and cut into thin rings. Rinse and spin dry arugula. Pluck larger leaves and chop coarsely. Rinse parsley leaves, shake dry and coarsely chop.

title: Rice and Vegetables from the Wok
description: Rinse the bell peppers, halve, and cut into wide strips. Rinse and cut the zucchini into small cubes.
types: ['Rice', 'Healthy Eating', 'Gluten-free', 'Gluten-free Vegetarian Recipe', 'Gluten-free Vegan Recipe', 'Gluten-free Dinner', 'Gluten-free Lunch', 'lactose-free vegetarian', 'food-combining', 'Food-Combining Dinner', 'Food-Combining Lunch', 'Vegan', 'Vegan Lunch', 'Vegan Dinner', 'Vegan Entree', 'whole-food', 'skillet dish', 'Family', 'College Cooking', 'fruit-vegetable', 'Onion', 'mushroom', 'Main Course']

title: Savory Coconut Rice Puff Pastry Rolls in Sushi Style
description: Heat the broiler. Rinse the peppers, dry, halve lengthwise and broil, skin side up until the skin blisters. Remove, cover and let stand until cool enough to handle and peel the skin. Cut the flesh into 2-3 cm (3/4-1 1/4 inch) wide strips. Rinse the bok choy, remove hard stalks and blanch ithe leaves in a pot of boiling salted water. Drain, rinse, and spread on a clean kitchen towel to dry.
types: ['Sushi', 'non-alcoholic', 'meat-free', 'Vegetarian', 'Vegetarian Appetizers', 'Vegetarian Snack', 'wrap', 'Asian', 'Exotic', 'Cooking on vacation', 'crowdpleaser', 'Guest', 'Party', 'Picnic', 'Vegetable', 'flowering vegetables', 'Rice', 'Brunch', 'Nibbles', 'Finger Food', 'Party Snack', 'Appetizer']

title: Chicken Curry with Saffron Rice
description: Rinse the chicken breast fillets, pat dry and cut into bite-size pieces. Cut the lime in half. Squeeze one half and cut the other half in slices for decoration. Drizzle the lime juice over the chicken breast. Mix the curry powder and sambal oelek together. Peel the onions and chop. Rinse, halve and seed the tomatoes. Cut the tomato pulp into cubes.

title: Italian Rice with Peas
description: Chop the remaining parsley finely. Mix the remaining butter and the Parmesan into the rice, then season with salt and pepper and serve immediately with parsley and grated Parmesean.

title: Zucchini Blossom Risotto
description: Rinse, trim and chop the zucchini into small pieces. Add the chopped zucchini to the rice during the last 5 minutes of cooking time.

title: Risotto with Asparagus and Peas
description: Combine asparagus pieces with 1.2 liters of water (approximately 5 cups) and bring to a boil, add 1/2 teaspoon of salt and sugar and simmer on medium heat for 15 minutes. Add broth.

title: Rice Paper Vegetable Wraps with Pineapple Chutney
description: For the wraps, soak the leaves according to package directions and pat dry. Rinse and trim the scallions and cut into thin rings. Rinse and trim the cabbage and cut into fine strips. Peel the carrots and grate. Mix the vegetables with ginger and cilantro and fry in hot oil for 2-3 minutes. Season with salt and soy sauce and spread the mixture on the center of each rice paper sheet. Turn in the sides and roll up tightly. Serve with the chutney in dipping bowls.

title: Bell Peppers with Rice
description: Meanwhile, peel the carrots and cut into pieces. Rinse the bell peppers, cut in half, remove seeds, remove ribs and dice. Peel the onion and chop. Heat the oil in a pan and sauté the onion along with the chopped carrots, deglaze with broth, cover and cook for about 5 minutes. Then add the paprika and chile pepper paste. Pour in wine, 50 ml (approximately 3 tablespoons) creme fraiche, broth, bell pepper and a little chopped marjoram. Simmer for another 3-5 minutes. Stir in the Parmesan, bring to a boil again and season with salt and pepper.

title: Rice Paper Rolls with Tofu and Vegetables
description: Cook the glass noodles according to package directions, then drain.

title: Vegetable Fried Rice with Seafood
description: Peel the garlic and chop finely. Rinse the scallions and cut into 3 cm (approximatey 1 inch) long pieces and cut in half lengthwise.

title: Trout Risotto
description: Peel onion, halve and finely dice. Fry onion in a pan with butter until translucent. Add rice and cook briefly. Pour a little white wine into rice, stirring constantly and season with salt and pepper. Pour in remaining white wine and stock and simmer until rice is cooked and creamy, but not mushy. Shortly before serving, add parsley and adjust seasonings.

title: Rice Paper Rolls with Thai Asparagus
description: Rinse asparagus, trim, remove ends and cut into 3 cm (approximately 1-inch) long pieces. Fry in hot oil, 4-5 minutes. Deglaze with fish sauce and season with cayenne pepper. Mix asparagus with remaining ingredients and season to taste. Place two rice paper sheets next to each other, overlapping. Add a piece of lettuce and distribute the asparagus filling over the lettuce, leaving an uncovered margin around the edges. Fold in the sheets and roll to create a cylinder shape.

title: Deep-fried Rice Balls with Filling the Italian Way
description: Peel the onion and garlic and chop finely. Rinse the meat, pat dry and cut into very small cubes. Thaw the peas. In a pan, heat the oil and braise the onion with the garlic until translucent. Add the meat and fry. Stir in the tomato paste and deglaze with the wine and stock.  Season with salt and pepper and let simmer over medium heat for 10-15 minutes. Mix in the peas, heat, and season with oregano. Cut the cheese into very small cubes. Remove a small portion of risotto, and form into a ball. Flatten the ball and enclose some of the diced cheese and meat inside. Continue until all risotto and filling is used.

title: Meatballs with Tomato and Pea Rice
description: 2. Peel the onions, cut in half, dice into small cubes and sauté half in butter in a pot until translucent. Add the rice and the tomatoes, sauté a little more and pour in the broth. Bring to a boil, cover, and simmer about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the peas to the rice and cook another 10 minutes.

title: Rice and Chickpea Salad with Alfalfa Sprouts, Olives and Tomatoes
description: Cut olives in half.

title: Pumpkin Stuffed with Rice and Vegetables
description: Pour rice into 300 ml (approximately 1 1/4 cup) of boiling salted water cook just until al dente. Drain and set aside to cool. Blanch tomatoes in boiling salted water, peel, remove seeds and dice. Rinse, trim and slice celery. Peel shallots and garlic, cut shallots into rings and slice garlic. Rinse and trim green beans. Rinse bell peppers, cut in half, remove seeds and ribs and chop. Sauté the celery with the shallots and garlic in hot oil, then mix in bell peppers and green beans and season with a little cardamom and turmeric to taste. Add tomatoes, pumpkin, ginger and broth. Stir in rice and season with salt and pepper. Fill the hollowed pumpkin with the stuffing mixture, replace the lid and tie with kitchen twine to secure the lid. Cook in a steamer for 30-40 minutes. Remove the kitchen twine and serve rice in the pumpkin sprinkled with cilantro.

title: Shrimp and Rice Noodle Soup
description: Rinse the parsley, shake dry and chop coarsely. Rinse the chilies, cut into rings and optionally remove the seeds for less heat. Add the chiles to the soup along with the shrimp and simmer 5-10 minutes.

title: Rice Salad with Mussels
description: Combine white wine, lemon juice, zest and fish stock, bring to  a boil. Add mussels and simmer, covered, for about 6-8 minutes or until mussels are tender. Remove mussels from broth (discard all unoponed ones) and separate meat, chop coarsely. (set 4 mussels aside for garnishing).

title: Rice and Mango Salad with Tomatoes
description: Peel onions and slice finely.

title: Colorful Mixed Paella
description: Rinse chicken, pork and rabbit. Pat meat dry and cut into portion-sized pieces.

title: Rice Salad with Prawns and Sliced Omelet
description: Peel carrot and cut into cubes. Rinse scallions, dry and cut diagonally into 1 cm (approximately 1/2-inch) wide pieces.

title: Omelet Rolls Filled with Spicy Rice
description: Rinse celery, remove strings and cut crosswise into thin slices. Rinse and thinly slice scallions. Peel the garlic and push through a garlic press. Rinse the peppers, halve lengthwise, remove seeds and ribs and dice finely. Rinse pepperoncini, remove seeds and finely chop.

title: Peppers Stuffed with Rice
description: Thaw peas. Soak raisins in warm water.

title: Dolmades (Grape Leaves Stuffed with Rice)
description: For the rice filling: Heat 3 tablespoons oil in a saucepan over medium heat, add the pine nuts, currants, rice and onions and cook until the onions are translucent. Add 3/8 liter (1 1/2 cups) water, season with salt and pepper, cover and simmer for about 15 minutes. Rinse the fresh herbs, shake dry and chop finely. Fold into the rice along with the dried mint.

title: Shrimp Summer Rolls with Ginger Soy Sauce
description: If you don't eat shellfish, you can always substitute the shrimp with tofu or grilled chicken.

title: Rice with Crispy Bacon, Pork and Peppers
description: Heat oil in a skillet, add bacon and cook until crispy. Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels. Sauté pork, working in batches and tossing frequently until cooked through, 2-3 minutes  per batch. Season with salt and pepper and remove from pan. Add the onion and bell pepper to the pan and sauté until piping hot, about 3 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Add bacon and pork to the and heat if necessary. Combine lemon zest with parsley and sprinkle over the rice to serve.

title: Caribbean Rice and Seafood
description: Rinse the scallops, shrimp and fish, pat dry and season with salt and pepper.  Heat the remaining oil in a skillet, add the seafood and saute until just cooked through,  4-5 minutes. Sprinkle with a little lime juice and serve on rice.

title: Tomatoes Stuffed with Rice and Sauce
description: Cook rice for filling in salted water according to package directions and drain. In a dry frying pan, roast pine nuts until golden brown and set aside.

title: Risotto with Apple and Gorgonzola
description: Rinse the apples, quarter, remove the seeds and cut the quarters into small, bite-sized pieces. Heat 2 tablespoons butter in a pan and cook the apples until tender, but not browned. Remove the rind and cut the gorgonzola into small, bite-sized pieces. Add the apple and cheese to the risotto and let sit 5 minutes.  Season with salt and pepper and serve.

title: Chicken and Risotto Gratin
description: Rinse chicken, pat dry and cut into narrow strips. Rinse spinach and spin dry. Toast almonds in a hot frying pan until golden, remove and set aside. Peel shallot and garlic and finely chop. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a pan and saute shallot and garlic until translucent. Add rice and saute until rice becomes translucent. Add wine and broth, season with salt and pepper, add chicken and cover with foil. Bake in a preheated oven for 30-35 minutes. Take out of oven 5 minutes before the end of cooking and stir almonds and spinach into risotto. Sprinkle with Parmesan and dot with butter, return briefly to oven. Season with salt and pepper and serve.
types: ['Chicken', 'Casserole', 'Rice Casserole', 'spinach casserole', 'baked dish', 'Poultry', 'leafy green vegetable', 'Rice', 'Risotto', 'Spinach risotto']

title: Risotto with Ratatouille
description: Rinse eggplant, halve, cut into cubes, sprinkle with salt and leave for 10 minutes.

title: Fruity Pork with Vegetables in a Wok
description: Rinse, trim and blanch the broccoli for 5 minutes in boiling salted water. Remove,rinse in cold water and drain well. Rinse the apples, quarter, remove the core and cut into narrow columns. Immediately sprinkle with 2 tablespoons of lemon juice. Peel the carrots, and cut into thin, long strips.

title: Mushroom Risotto with Diced Ham
description: Cut ham into cubes.

title: Mushroom Risotto with Fried Pumpkin
description: Rinse and trim the leeks and also cut into thin slices.

title: Saffron Rice with Apple and Vegetables
description: Wash the apples and cut into quarters. Remove the core and cut into wedges. Peel the onions and cut into quarters. Wash the Brussels sprouts, blanch for 5 to 7 minutes in boiling salted water, remove, and drain.

title: Veggie Wrap with Tomato, Rice and Beans
description: Meanwhile rinse the beans in a colander and drain. Rinse the tomatoes, quarter, remove seeds and cut into small cubes.

title: Grilled Halibut with Orzo
description: Cover fish and keep refrigerated for 30 minutes. Meanwhile, drain olives and cut into quarters. Rinse mint, shake dry and pluck off leaves. Cook orzo pasta in boiling salted water until al dente.

title: Rice Salad with Asian Vegetables, Black Sesame and Wasabi
description: Rinse and dry scallions and cut into narrow rings. Peel and grate carrots. Cut nori into strips. Roast sesame seeds in a hot dry skillet, remove and set aside. Cut ginger into wide strips. Rinse and dry zucchini, quarter lengthwise and cut into thin slices. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Heat oil in a pan and sauté chicken, vegetables and ginger for a short time. Remove from heat and stir in rice. Mix rice wine vinegar, soy sauce, lime juice and oil. Season with salt and pepper.  Add sesame seeds. Toss salad with vinaigrette. Serve with wasabi.

title: Vegetable and Chicken Rice with Lime
description: Cover and simmer for about 15 minutes. 5 minutes before the end of cooking stir in peas. Season with salt, pepper and cayenne pepper. Combine with rice, mix well. Drizzle with lime juice. Season with more salt if necessary. Serve immediately.

title: Asian Soup with Rice Noodles, Mushrooms and Leeks
description: Heat oil in a large saucepan and sauté garlic and ginger for about 1-2 minutes. Add broth, oyster sauce, vegetable strips, mushrooms and lemongrass and simmer for 5-10 minutes on medium heat. Add drained rice noodles and briefly heat. Season with salt and pepper. Serve.

title: Asparagus Risotto
description: Peel lower third of asparagus, cut off woody ends and blanch asparagus in boiling salted water for 5 minutes. Put aside about 800 ml of asparagus, put asparagus in cold, cut off tops and cut remaining rods in narrow slices.

title: Wild Rice Salad with Radish and Ginger
description: Bring the rice, 400 ml (approximately 14 ounces) of water, and cumin to a boil. Season with salt, and simmer over low heat for 45 minutes. Remove from the heat and cool. Rinse and dry the arugula, then chop into bite-sized pieces. Mix the onion-ginger marinade with the oil, season to taste with salt and pepper, then mix into the salad. Serve the salad on plates.

title: Sweet Italian Risotto with Strawberries and Pistachios
description: Rinse, dry and halve strawberries.

title: Sweet Fruit Sushi
description: Knead marzipan with food coloring on a surface dusted with powdered sugar. Put between two layers of plastic wrap and roll 1 to 1.5 mm (approximately 1/50 inch) thick. Remove plastic wrap and cut marzipan into 1 cm (approximately 1/3 inch) wide strips.

title: Apple and Rice Pudding Gratin
description: Bring milk with a pinch of salt and butter to a boil, stirring occasionally. Add rice and cook covered on the lowest heat for about 30-40 minutes, stirring. Cool.

title: Saffron Rice Pudding with Cranberry Compote
description: Remove lid and allow rice pudding to cool. Remove vanilla pod and lemon peel. Preheat the oven to 180°C (approximately 350°F) convection. Rinse untreated lemon with hot water, wipe dry and remove peel (into zest). Squeeze out juice. Finely chop half of zest from peel. Separate eggs. Mix egg whites with salt and 2 tablespoons of lemon juice until stiff.

title: Sweet Coconut Rice with Apricots and Raisins
description: Cook for about 15-25 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add water if necessary. Season coconut rice to taste. Garnish with mint and serve.

title: Sweet Rhubarb Sushi
description: Rinse a lemon, pat dry, halve and remove the peel from 1 half.  Split the vanilla bean lengthwise, scrape out the seeds and place both in a saucepan with the milk, cinnamon stick and lemon peel. and bring to a boil. Add the rice and simmer over very low heat until tender, about 25 minutes. Cover and cool to room temperature. Remove vanilla bean and cinnamon stick.

title: Rice and Pepper Salad with Mango and Curry Chicken
description: Bring the broth to a boil in a pot, add the chicken breasts and cook until done, about 20 minutes. Remove, pat dry and cut into large cubes. Mix the yogurt with curry, turmeric and oil and season with salt, pepper and a dash of lemon juice. Add the diced chicken to the yogurt, mix in and marinate.

title: Nasi Goreng with Pancake Rolls
description: Bring rice with 600ml (approximately 2.5 cups) of water and a pinch of salt to a boil and cook for 20-25 minutes. Meanwhile, rinse celery, trim and cut into thin slices. Peel carrot and also cut into slices. Rinse peppers, cut in half, remove seeds and cut into small cubes. Rinse cilantro, shake dry, pluck off leaves and chop finely. Peel onion and garlic and chop finely. In a frying pan heat butter and fry vegetables for 3-4 minutes. Add rice and fry for another 3 minutes. The cilantro mix, season with salt and pepper and fill in noodle bowls. Serve with 3 Pancake rolls per bowl.

title: Plantains and Rice
description: Peel plantain and cut into slices. Heat remaining oil and fry the slices until crispy, turning several times. Place plantains on the finished rice before serving.

title: Cherry Rice Strudel
description: Mix the milk with the salt, spices, and sugar. Cook the washed rice according to the directions on the package. Remove from heat and let cool until lukewarm. Fold in the cherries, eggs, lemon zest, and pistachios. Roll out the puff pastry on a floured surface to a rectangle, about 40 x 20 cm (approximately 16 x 8 inches). Spread the rice filling evenly over the rough. Roll the dough and brush with egg yolk and place seam side down on a parchment-lined baking pan. Bake in a preheated oven at 220°C (approximately 425°F) for about 45 minutes, until golden brown.

title: Baked Vegetables and Rice
description: Rinse and trim the eggplant and cut into thin slices. Rinse the bell peppers, trim, cut in half, remove seeds and ribs and dice.

title: Rosemary Risotto with Button Mushrooms and Chanterelles
description: Clean the mushrooms, if necessary and cut or tear into smaller pieces. Sauté in remaining butter, season salt and pepper and stir in lemon juice.

title: Pork with Spicy Fruit Rice
description: Rinse the meat, pat dry, and season with salt and pepper. Sear it in a hot pan with oil. Transfer to preheated oven for about 25 minutes until pink.

title: Sweet Risotto with Fig and Raspberry
description: Rinse the raspberries and finely puree half of them with the powdered sugar. Mix the whole raspberries into the puree, reserving a few for garnish. In serving glasses, alternate layers of risotto and raspberry.

title: Sushi with Fruit
description: Rinse 1/2 lemon in hot water, pat dry and cut a strip from peel.

title: Sweet Risotto with Figs and Raspberry Sauce
description: Rinse the figs and cut into small cubes. Chop the white chocolate. Add both to the rice mixture, mix well and remove from heat.

title: Milk Rice Dumplings with Balsamic Strawberries
description: Rinse, the strawberries and cut into small pieces. Mix with honey and set aside.

title: Sweet Mango Sushi
description: Then take spice mixture back from the rice and shape it into oval rolls.

title: Sweet Risotto with Cherries and Figs
description: Stir occasionally. As soon as risotto is cooled, remove cinnamon stick and lemon peel. Rinse figs, pat dry and quarter. Layer risotto and figs in a dessert glass. Drizzle with cherry juice and garnish with sour cherries. Serve.

title: Rice Pudding with Raisins
description: Combine milk with salt and sugar, add rice and bing to a boil. Cover and cook on low heat until rice is soft and liquid is almost all absorbed. Add raisins, butter and cinnamon. Stir. Serve hot or cold.

title: Chicken in Rice Paper Rolls
description: Rinse chicken breasts, pat dry, sprinkle with a little soy sauce and place in a bamboo steamer. In a saucepan, combine 200 ml (approximately 1 cup) water with rice vinegar. Bring to a boil, set bamboo steamer over the water and cook 8-10 minutes. Remove the chicken breasts, let cool and cut into strips.

title: Rice Pudding with Pistachios
description: Remove the vanilla bean and spoon the rice pudding into bowls. Serve sprinkled with chopped pistachios.

title: Risotto with Squid
description: Rinse squid and pat dry. Peel carrot and shallot. Dice carrot finely and cut shallot into strips. Sauté 1-2 minutes with carrot in remaining oil. Add squid and cook 3-4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Spicy Rice and Vegetable Salad with Raisins
description: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a skillet. Drain the raisins. Add the zucchini, carrot, celery, chile, and the raisins and cook, stirring occasionally until the vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes. Add the rice and almonds and stir to combine.

title: Coconut Milk Soup with Shrimp, Rice Noodles and Bean Sprouts
description: Peel and rinse the shrimp. Heat the spice paste with 1 tablespoon of oil, pour in the fish stock and coconut milk and boil for 5 minutes. Add the shrimp and cook for another minute.

title: Asian Rice Balls with Chinese Cabbage and Mango
description: Meanwhile, peel carrot and finely dice. Rinse leek well, drain and cut about 8 cm (approximately 3 1/4 inches) of leek into very fine dice. Add diced vegetables to rice about 5 minutes before end of cooking.

title: Rice Noodles with Leeks and Sweet and Sour Chile Sauce
description: Rinse and chop chilies.

title: Risotto with Green and White Asparagus
description: Peel the lower third of the asparagus and cut the remainder into small pieces. Peel the white asparagus completely and cut into small pieces. Heat the remaining butter in a skillet, add the green and white asparagus and saute briefly. Deglaze with white wine, cover and simmer until al dente, 6-8 minutes. Stir half of the Parmesan into the rice along with the asparagus. Season with salt and pepper and lemon juice and serve immediately garnished with the remaining Parmesan.

title: Rice Fritters with Vegetables
description: Heat oil in a pan. Use a tablespoon to scoop small portions of batter and place the fritters in the pan. Fry on both sides, about 5- 6 minutes.

title: California Rolls with Caviar
description: Line the sushi rolling mat with plastic wrap and place a nori sheet with the smooth side down. Spread half of the sushi rice on it, slightly press and turn the nori over carefully, so that the rice is directly on the plastic.

title: Dirty Rice with Cranberries and Pecans
description: Sauté 1-2 minutes while stirring. Pour in the chicken broth and bring to a boil. Cook over low heat until the rice has absorbed almost all the liquid, about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the scallions, parsley and pecans, simmer 3-4 minutes and season again with salt and cayenne pepper. Serve hot.
types: ['Rice', 'skillet rice dish', 'North America', 'American', 'Cooking on vacation', 'Vegetable', 'Side Dish']

title: Risotto with Cheese and Eggplant
description: For the risotto, peel onion and garlic and chop finely. Heat 4 tablespoons oil in a saucepan and sauté onion, garlic and lemon zest over medium heat. Pour in the rice and cook briefly while stirring, then pour in the wine. Bring to a boil and cook until the liquid is almost completely evaporated. Ladle in about 150 ml (approximately 3/4 cup) of hot broth and the lemon juice and cook, stirring frequently, until almost all liquid is absorbed. Continue to add broth in this manner and cook until rice is al dente, about 20 minutes, stirring frequently.

title: Deep-Fried Rice Balls with Tomato Sauce
description: Season rice with salt and pepper. Cut Gorgonzola into cubes. Place 1 tablespoon rice in your palm (dampened with a bit of water to prevent sticking). Place a Gorgonzola cube in the center of the rice, and form a ball around the cheese. Dip rice balls in beaten egg, coat with breadcrumbs and fry until golden brown in hot oil. Serve with tomato sauce and basil to garnish.

title: South African Style Rice Salad
description: Combine yogurt and mayonnaise, mix well and season lightly with salt and pepper. Rinse lemon balm leaves, shake dry and pluck small ones. Arrange lemon leaves in bowls, top wtih salad, toss lightly and serve.
