title: Chestnut Risotto
description: Season with salt and pepper, and chopped parsley. Stir in the grated Parmesan and serve immediately.

title: Cuban-Style Rice Dish
description: Brown the meat in hot oil, sprinkle with Cajun seasoning, then add the onions and garlic and sweat until translucent. Add the rice, sauté briefly, pour in vegetable stock, stir and gently simmer everything covered about 15-20 minutes.

title: Rice Paper Rolls Filled with Vegetables and Papaya
description: Briefly dip each rice paper sheet in cold water and place on a damp kitchen towel (after 1-2 minutes the leaves become pliable). Lay papaya, beet and mushroom strips bundled at the bottom of the sheets of rice paper in the center, leaving free a small area around the edges. Sprinkle with cilantro. Wrap rice paper around filling, rolling tightly. Prepare a wide pot with 1-2 cups of boiling water. Place a bamboo steaming basket on top, then put the rice paper rolls in the basket. Cover and steam for 5 minutes.

title: Sushi with Tuna
description: Divide the sushi rice into 8 portions and shape each portion with moistened in water and vinegar with hands (into oblong balls). Cut the nori sheet in 8 rectangular pieces and attach each piece on top of a rice ball. Cut the tuna fillet into 8 slices. Place a leek on the work surface and place the tuna in the middle.  Take a little wasabi and place the rice ball with the nori on it. Hold the ends of the leeks strip upwards and gently tie together. Serve the tuna sushi with a dollop of wasabi paste on a plate.

title: Grilled Pork Strips with Tomato Rice Salad
description: Add diced tomatoes into finished rice and serve.

title: Vegetable and Mushroom Rice
description: While the rice is cooking, cut the beans into 3 cm (approximately 1 inch) long pieces, blanch for 2 minutes in salted water. Drain and rinse in cold water. Rinse the broccoli, cut into florets, blanch 1 minute, drain and rinse in cold water. Wash the chilli, cut in half, clean and chop very finely. Rinse mushrooms, cut into slices and fry in butter. Add the chili pepper, fry briefly, then add beans and broccoli and cook for a few additional minutes.

title: Risotto with Radicchio
description: Trim radicchio, rinse, divide into leaves and cut into bite-sized pieces. Heat the rest of the butter in a pan and sear the radicchio briefly. Season with salt and pepper, and fold the radicchio into the risotto just before serving.

title: Risotto with Pumpkin, Leeks and Herbs
description: Add the pumpkin cubes and deglaze with the white wine. Ladle in about 150 ml (approximately 3/4 cup) of hot broth and cook, stirring frequently, until almost all liquid is absorbed. Continue to add broth in this manner and cook until rice is al dente, about 20 minutes, stirring frequently. Grate the Parmesan finely and stir half into the risotto. Season with salt and pepper. Place risotto on plates and serve garnished with the remaining Parmesan.

title: Apple Risotto with Radicchio
description: Season the risotto with salt and pepper. Stir in radicchio, 4 tablespoons Parmesan and the remaining butter. Distribute among 4 plates and serve sprinkled with some grated Parmesan.

title: Lettuce Rolls Filled with Rice Noodles and Turkey
description: Cook rice noodles according to package specification and drain.

title: Vegetable Rice Salad
description: Rinse bell peppers, halve, remove ribs and seeds and cut peppers into small cubes.

title: Turkey Strips on Fried Rice
description: Cut the meat into strips about 1/4 inch wide.  Peel garlic and chop finely.  Clean, wash and cut the scallions into rings. Wash the basil, shake dry and coarsely chop the leaves.

title: Bulgarian-Style Grape Leaves with Rice and Raisin Filling
description: Rinse the grape leaves under cold water and pat dry. Place two grape leaves overlapping each other to create a very large surface.

title: Peppers with Rice and Currant Filling
description: Heat 4 tablespoons oil in a pan and sauté the onions along with the pine nuts. Drain the rice, add to the pan together with the spices and currants and sauté until the rice is soft. Add enough water so the rice is almost covered and cook on low heat for about 15 minutes. Stir in the herbs. Halve the tomatoes, core and cut the flesh into squares (slightly larger than the opening of the peppers).

title: Sushi Rice Rolls with Caviar
description: Place a strip of avocado on the lower third, brush with wasabi paste and roll up tight, being careful to remove the plastic wrap. Cut each of the 4 sushi rolls into 6 equal sized pieces and top each with a little caviar. Serve 6 pieces per person.

title: Risotto with King Prawns
description: Add the broth a little at a time waiting for it to be absorbed by the rice before adding more. Repeat this procedure until the rice is cooked, about 20 minutes.

title: Tuna Risotto
description: Garnish with parsley and serve in bowls

title: Wild Rice with Beef and Vegetables
description: Cook the wild rice according to package directions. Press the cooked wild rice into timbale molds while still warm.

title: Lamb Rolls with Wild Garlic Filling
description: For the filling, toast the pine nuts in a dry skillet until fragrant. Rinse the wild garlic, shake dry and coarsely chop. Grate the Parmesan. Mix the pine nuts, wild garlic and Parmesan together and purée with 3 tablespoons of olive oil and season with salt and pepper.

title: Vietnamese Spring Roll
description: Drop the noodles briefly into salted boiling water and cook according to package directions. Drain in a colander, rinse with cold water, and drain again.

title: Prosciutto-Stuffed Chicken with Rice and Green Beans
description: For the rice: Peel garlic and thinly slice garlic. Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil in a skillet. Add the garlic and cook until golden brown. Add the rice, chese and basil, and season with salt and pepper to taste. Cook until warmed through.

title: Stuffed Chicken Breast with Vegetable Rice
description: Skin and rinse the chicken breast halves. Cut a pocket in each fillet half with a very sharp knife and season with salt and pepper. Drain the mozzarella and cut into small cubes, then mix with the cooled spinach. Spoon some of the spinach-cheese filling into every pocket and secure the opening with a toothpick. Beat the eggs with a fork. Dip the chicken breast in the flour, then dredge in the egg and finally in breadcrumbs. Press the breading firmly to adhere. Heat the butter and oil in a pan and brown the stuffed chicken breast halves over medium heat 10 minutes on both sides.
types: ['Chicken', 'skillet dish', 'Cordon Bleu', 'Poultry', 'leafy green vegetable', 'fruit-vegetable', 'Legume', 'Onion', 'Cheese', 'Herb', 'Rice', 'Rice Side Dish', 'Main Course']

title: Spanish Rice with Seafood (Paella)
description: Blanch tomatoes,  peel, cut in half, remove seeds and stems and chop coarsely. Peel the onion and garlic, and chop finely. Cut the squid into rings. Pour half the olive oil in a paella pan (or in a large shallow pan when no paella pan is available) and heat. Cook shellfish, shrimp, squid and fish fillets in succession, remove from the pan and keep warm. The mussels that have not opened should be thrown away, as they are not edible.

title: Risotto with Squid
description: Rinse the squid and pat dry. Saute in the remaining oil until golden brown, 6-8 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Saffron Rice with Vegetables
description: Cook rice according to package instructions.

title: Vanilla Orange Rice Custard Cake
description: For the filling, heat milk, salt and vanilla bean seeds in a pan and bring to a boil and stir in rice. Cover and simmer over low heat for about 40 minutes until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed and remove from heat and let cool.
types: ['cake or tart with fruit', 'Cake', 'egg-free cake', 'Diabetic', 'Summer Cake', 'Fruit', 'Tropical Fruit', 'Rice']

title: Fruit Rice Pudding with Chocolate
description: Preheat the oven to 180°C (approximately 350°F). Rinse and halve plums, removing pits. Chop chocolate coarsely. Separate the eggs. Stir together yolks, plums and chocolate. Beat egg white until stiff, sprinkle in the remaining sugar (60 grams or approximately 2 1/2 tbsp). Fold egg whites into rice pudding. Place the rice pudding in an ovenproof dish (20 x 20 cm or approximately 8 x 8 inches). Chop the macadamia nuts coarsely and spread on the rice pudding along with small pieces of butter. Bake the rice casserole in the hot oven on the middle rack until golden brown 30-40 minutes. Serve warm.

title: Rice Pudding with Fresh Berries
description: Prepare sauce. Combine raspberries with lemon zest, sugar and 3-4 tablespoons of water and bring to a boil. Strain though a sieve and cool.

title: Raspberry Rice Pudding
description: Set aside 4 tablespoons of milk. Combine remaining milk with cream and halved vanilla bean, bring to a boil. Add  rice and honey and cook, covered, for about 40 minutes on low heat or until rice is soft.

title: Sweet Spring Roll with Apple
description: Thaw spring roll dough. Lay sheets on the work surface and place 2 tablespoons filling in the center of each piece of dough. Fold in the two opposite sides, then roll tightly.

title: Rice Pudding with Apple and Mango Sauce
description: Whisk egg yolks with butter and sugar until fluffy,  add to rice. Add chopped lemon zest and carefully fold in egg whites. Pour mixture into a buttered baking dish and bake in preheated oven at 180°C (approximately 350°F) for 40-50 minutes. For compote, peel mango, core and cut pulp in strips. Set  4 small strips aside and cut remaining strips into small cubes. Peel apple, quarter, core and cut into small cubes.
types: ['Pome Fruit', 'Casserole', 'Rice Casserole', 'Vegetarian Casserole', 'baked dish', 'Fruit', 'Tropical Fruit', 'Rice', 'Menu', 'Dessert', 'Fruit Dessert', 'dessert']

title: Rice Puddings with Fruit
description: Set aside 4 tablespoons of the milk. In a saucepan, bring the remaining milk, cream and vanilla bean (split lengthwise) to a boil. Stir in rice and honey. Cover and simmer over low heat until rice is tender, about 40 minutes.

title: Rice Soup with Lemon and Parsley
description: Bring the chicken broth to a boil. Ladle about 200 ml (approximately 1 cup) of the hot chicken broth into the egg mixture and whisk vigorously. Reduce the heat to low and stir the eggs into the chicken broth. Season with salt, pepper and allspice to taste. Ladle the soup into bowls, add a scoop of rice, sprinkle with chopped parsley and garnish with the reserved lemon zest.

title: Coconut Rice Pudding with Strawberries
description: Rinse the strawberries, pat dry and slice thinly. Spoon the rice into small serving bowls and top with the sliced strawberries. Sprinkle with coconut strips, garnish with lemon balm and serve.

title: Shrimp and Rice Noodle Salad
description: Place the rice noodles in a heatproof bowl, pour 750 ml (approximately 3 1/2 cups) boiling water over and let soak 10 minutes.

title: Peppers Stuffed with Saffron Rice
description: Chop dried tomatoes finely. Peel the onion and finely chop. Peel garlic, press and mix in a bowl with 1 tablespoon oil, cream, onions and tomatoes. Crush feta with a fork. Rinse scallions and chop finely. Mix everything with all the herbs into the rice and season with cayenne.

title: Seafood Risotto
description: Rinse asparagus, peel off bottom third and cut off ends. Blanch in boiling salted water for about 8 minutes and drain.

title: Paella
description: Heat 5 tablespoons olive oil in a large, deep frying pan and cook onion until soft, then add garlic. Deglaze with 1/2 liter (approximately 2 cups) of broth and simmer for 10 minutes. Heat remaining oil in a large paella pan. Add rice and cook briefly. Dissolve saffron in a few spoonfuls of hot broth and add, with remaining broth and onion mixture, to rice. Bring to a boil and simmer for about 25 minutes.

title: Sausage and Shrimp Jambalaya
description: Add the celery, onions, tomatoes and garlic and sauté for 5 minutes. Add the rice and sauté briefly. Pour in the chicken stock, cover and simmer for about 20-25 minutes, until the rice is al dente, stirring occasionally. Sauté the shrimp in the remaining olive oil. Stir into the rice just before serving along with the cayenne pepper. Season with salt and pepper and serve garnished with fresh herbs, if desired.

title: Risotto
description: Stir in the grated Parmesan and season with salt and pepper. Arrange on plates, sprinkle dill and shaved Parmesan and serve immediately.

title: Crispy Vegetable Wraps
description: Blanch the vegetables in boiling salted water until al dente, shock in ice water and drain. Mix with the crème fraîche and season with salt and pepper.

title: Tomato Stuffed with Curried Rice
description: Cut chives in rings. Rinse radishes, drain and wipe dry and cut into  small, thin rectangular pieces.

title: Beef Ragout
description: Peel the onions and garlic and dice both.

title: Paella
description: Distribute the mussels and shrimp onto the finished rice and serve garnished with parsley.

title: Rice Pudding with Mandarins and Apples
description: In a saucepan, combine buttermilk, tangerine juice and cream. Bring to a boil. Add Arborio rice, lemon zest and sugar. Cover and simmer over low heat, about 20 minutes.

title: Steamed Rice Balls
description: Mix the egg, soy sauce, and rice wine into the meat and mix well with hands. Add a pinch of sugar and season well with salt. Form mixture into walnut-size balls (if mixture is too loose add breadcrumbs). Put the drained rice in a shallow dish and roll the meatballs in it until they are completely covered with rice.

title: Fruity Saffron Rice with Meat
description: Peel the papaya and cut the flesh into small pieces. Season the rice with sambal oelek, fold in the papaya pieces with the lemon juice and serve.

title: Jasmine Rice with Mushrooms and Coconut Milk
description: Cook Jasmine rice according to package instructions. Divide rice among bowls and top with mushrooms in coconut milk. Garnish with parsley and sprinkle with lime juice. Serve with lime wedges.

title: Fruity Rice Salad with Turkey
description: Boil the peas in salted water for about 5 minutes. Blanch and drain. Peel and cut out segments from the blood orange, then cut into small pieces. Peel and remove core from the pineapple, and cut into small pieces.

title: Sweet Sticky Rice Balls with Coconut Milk
description: Roll rice into balls and serve with mint.

title: Rice Noodles
description: Peel garlic and chop finely. Minced knead with expressed bread, garlic, egg, chile and coriander. Season with salt and pepper. Form many small meatballs. Heat 5 tablespoons oil in a pan and fry meatballs until golden brown. Drain on paper towels.

title: Seafood Risotto
description: Rinse the asparagus, remove and discard the tough woody bottoms and peel the lower third. Cut the asparagus diagonally into 4 cm (approximately 1 1/2-inch) long pieces. Blanch in a pot of boiling salted water for 5 minutes Drain, rinse under cold water and drain well.

title: Chanterelle Risotto
description: In a saucepan, heat the vegetable broth. Dissolve the saffron in 2 tablespoons hot broth. Peel and finely dice the shallot and garlic.

title: Risoni with Vegetables
description: Add lemon juice to risoni, season with salt and pepper and let stand for 10 minutes, covered.

title: Rice Muesli with Grapes and Raisins
description: Stir in lemon juice and sweeten to taste with grenadine.

title: Pumpkin in Caramel Sauce
description: In a pan, boil together sugar and 2 tablespoons water. Stir constantly and caramelize slowly until golden brown. Remove from heat. Add butter, pumpkin, scallions, chile and garlic and stir-fry 2 - 3 minutes. Add lime zest and juice, and the pumpkin seeds. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Risotto with Lobster
description: For the risotto, trim woody ends from both types of asparagus, then peel white asparagus (and lower third of green asparagus if desired) and cut into small cubes.

title: Ham Rolls with Rice Stuffing
description: Top ham slices with the rice mixture, roll and cut into 3 cm (approximately 1 inch) wide pieces. Insert a wooden skewer and serve.

title: Cabbage Rolls
description: Boil the rice in salted water and then drain.

title: Shrimp and Coconut Curry
description: Cook the rice according to package instructions and drain. Add 2 teaspoons butter and the drained raisins and season with salt and pepper. Arrange in serving bowls with the shrimp curry. Sprinkle with parsley to serve.

title: Paella
description: Add the seafood (if frozen, then thaw first) saffron and chicken, season with salt and pepper, and pour in 400 ml (approximately 1 2/3 cup) of water. Boil briefly, then cook, covered over low heat for 20 minutes. Simmer until the rice al dente. Season to taste and serve garnished with fresh basil.

title: Spice Rice
description: Put the saffron in a bowl and cover with 3 tablespoons boiling water. Peel the carrots and cut into thin slices. Rinse and drain snow peas.

title: Coconut Chicken Curry over Pasta
description: Rinse the chicken breasts, pat dry and cut into bite-size pieces. Trim the lemongrass, cut the bottom white part into thin rings. Rinse the chile, slit lengthwise, remove the seeds and white ribs and very finely chop. Peel and very finely chop the onion and garlic.

title: Rice Pudding
description: Serve rice pudding in bowls with strawberry sauce and garnished with mint leaves.

title: Fruity Spiced Rice
description: Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a pan and sauté the turmeric and garam masala in it briefly, add the drained raisins, almonds and rice. Remove from the heat and allow everything to cool.

title: Rice with Beans and Peppers
description: Peel and dice shallot. Heat the oil in a pan and saute the shallot until translucent. Add the butter and rice and saute breifly. Add the broth and season with salt and pepper. Bring the broth to a boil, reduce the heat to a simmer, cover and cook until tender, about 20 minutes.

title: Chicken Curry with Rice and Mango Chutney
description: Bring the coconut milk and poultry stock to a boil. Rinse the cilantro, shake dry and chop. Mix the coconut milk with lemon juice, cilantro, curry powder, sambal oelek and season with salt and pepper.

title: Risotto with Scallops and Scallions
description: Rinse scallops under running water and drive a short knife into the shell along the edge, loosening the shell. Open and cut meat loose. Free white flesh and red-orange roe (Corail) from the gray edges. Rinse meat thoroughly several times.

title: Risotto with Porcini
description: Peel onion and garlic, chop finely.

title: Tomato Rice
description: Sweat the chopped shallot in a pan with olive oil until translucent. Mix in the pressed ​​garlic, bay leaf, and chopped tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper. Simmer for about 15 minutes, stir in the rice, and simmer for another few minutes. Serve garnished with the Parmesan.

title: Fruity Chicken Curry
description: Rinse basmati rice in a sieve under running water. Then bring rice to a boil with about twice the amount of lightly salted water. Cover and simmer on very low heat for about 25 minutes.

title: Vegetables and Rice Stew
description: Peel and finely chop onion. Halve peppers, remove seeds and ribs, and cut into thin strips. Rinse and trim zucchini, celery and fennel. Cut zucchini and celery into cubes. Slice fennel thinly.
types: ['Stew', 'Slow-Carb Diet', 'Low-protein', 'Gluten-free', 'Gluten-free Vegetarian Recipe', 'Gluten-free Vegan Recipe', 'Gluten-free Dinner', 'Gluten-free Lunch', 'lactose-free vegetarian', 'Lactose-free Soup', 'non-alcoholic', 'food-combining', 'Food-Combining Dinner', 'Food-Combining Lunch', 'Vegan Lunch', 'Vegan Dinner', 'Vegan Soup', 'Vegetarian Lunch', 'Vegetarian Dinner', 'Vegetarian Soups', 'weight-loss', 'Vegetable', 'fruit-vegetable', 'Root Vegetable', 'Herb', 'Rice', 'Vegetable Soup', 'Vegetable Stew', 'Lunch', 'Dinner', 'Main Course']

title: Wild Rice Salad
description: Mix the lemon juice with the honey with the peppercorns and season with pepper. Stir in the onion and ginger and leave to stand for about 30 minutes.

title: Stuffed Peppers with Rice and Turkey
description: Slice turkey breast and stir-fry in a pan in 1 tablespoon hot oil. Season with salt and pepper, remove and set aside.

title: Arroz Congri (Cuban Rice and Black Beans)
description: Heat oil in a pan and sauté vegetables with caraway seeds, then add to rice. Add bay leaf and wine, simmer about 20 minutes until the rice is cooked. To serve, season with salt and garnish with fresh oregano.

title: Rice with Beans
description: Heat oil in a pan and sauté vegetables with cumin. Then add to the pot. Add the bay leaf and wine, season with salt, and simmer everything about 20 minutes until the rice is cooked. Garnish with fresh oregano to serve.

title: Chicken Breast Fillet with Corn and Rice
description: Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Sauté them in 2 tablespoons hot butter, about 5 minutes on each side until done. Pour the cream and creme fraiche into the pan, let heat, and season with salt and pepper to taste.

title: Clams with Rice
description: Peel and finely chop garlic. Rinse clams thoroughly to remove sand. Discard any opened clams. Heat 4 tablespoons olive oil in a pan. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, but not colored. Add clams and cook about 3 minutes. Continue cooking until all clams are opened. Discard any unopened clams. Add water and fish stock and cook over low heat about 4 minutes. Transfer clams to a bowl. Pour cooking liquid through a fine sieve over clams to remove any remaining sand. Add herbs and remaining olive oil. Season with salt and pepper and serve with rice.

title: Rice Salad with Smoked Salmon
description: Rinse and dry pepper, halve, remove seeds and ribs, and cut into small cubes. Peel carrot, slice lengthwise into thin slices.

title: Zucchini Risotto
description: Heat oil in a saucepan and fry the onion until soft. Add rice and cook while stirring over medium heat until it is light and translucent. Ladle in about 150 ml (approximately 3/4 cup) of hot broth and cook, stirring frequently, until almost all liquid is absorbed. Stir in saffron and zucchini pieces. Continue to add broth in this manner and cook until rice is al dente, about 20 minutes, stirring frequently. Stir in parsley and season with salt and pepper. Just before serving, fold in butter and Parmesan. Garnished with zucchini strips and serve immediately.

title: Saffron Rice with Black Beans and Chicken
description: Rinse tomatoes and cut into small pieces. Rinse peppers, cut in half, remove seeds and ribs, pat dry and cut into small pieces. Peel onion and cut into wedges.

title: Tomato, Vegetable and Bacon Rice
description: Peel and chop the shallots and garlic. Rinse and dice the zucchini. Rinse the bell pepper, cut in half, remove the ribs and seeds and dice. Cut the bacon slices into large pieces.

title: Colorful Vegetable Risotto
description: Add rice and cook briefly until light and translucent. Deglaze with some vegetable broth and cook over medium heat, stirring until liquid has evaporated. Add more broth and stir until evaporated.

title: Dolmas
description: Place the leaves on a work surface and trim the stems. Add 1 teaspoon of rice filling on the wide end. Then fold in the right and left sides over the filling. Then roll up from the top down.

title: Pineapple Fried Rice with Eggs
description: Peel pineapple thoroughly and cut into quarters lengthwise. Cut out core, halve the quarters lengthwise and cut crosswise into small pieces. Peel the onions and cut into fine cubes.

title: Bell Pepper and Black Olive Risotto
description: Add the pepper strips and rosemary branch. Continue to add broth and cook until rice is al dente, about 20 minutes, stirring frequently and allowing liquid to evaporate between additions of broth.

title: Rice, Zucchini and Ham Casserole
description: Rinse zucchini and cut into thin strips. Cut ham into thin strips. Heat oil in a pan. Add zucchini. Season with thyme, nutmeg, salt and pepper and cook about 5 minutes.

title: Vegetable Risotto
description: Peel and finely chop the shallot and garlic. Sautée in a pan with 1 tablespoon of butter. Add the rice and let simmer, stirring occasionally. Pour in the wine and boil over high heat, stirring constantly. Pour in one ladle of broth, reduce heat and let simmer, stirring occasionally. Gradually pour in more broth, just enough until the risotto is covered. After about 20 minutes the risotto will be cooked.

title: Shrimp Risotto
description: After about 10-15 minutes of cooking and stirring, add the shrimp and continue adding the stock one ladle at a time, stirring until absorbed and the rice is cooked, approximately 20-25 minutes. Rinse the wild garlic, chop coarsely and add to the risotto along with the butter. Season with salt and pepper and serve immediately.

title: Tofu Rice and Vegetable Fritters
description: Add the eggs and breadcrumbs, stirring to combine and season with soy sauce, salt and pepper. Shape the mixture into 16 fritters. Heat the remaining oil in a nonstick skillet and saute the fritters, working in batches if necessary until golden brown, about 5 minutes per side. Serve with parsley.

title: Lamb Chops with Savory Raisin Rice
description: Brush lamb chops with oil. Season with salt and pepper and cook on hot grill for about 1-2 minutes per side. Serve chops accompanied by rice.

title: Rice with Turkey, Pork and Shrimp
description: Thaw peas. Toast peanuts and coconut in a dry frying pan until golden. Set aside. Peel and finely dice onions. Rinse and halve peppers, remove seeds and ribs and cut into strips. In a wok or deep frying pan, sear meat in a little oil. Add onions, peas and peppers and stir-fry 2-3 minutes. Season with soy sauce, sambal oelek, salt and pepper. Stir in rice and shrimp. Season again to taste and serve sprinkled with coconut flakes and peanuts.

title: Deep-Fried Rice Balls
description: Cut mozzarella or provatura cheese into tiny cubes. Remove large portions with a spoon the rice and egg mixture and flatten in hand. Place some filling in the centers. Form the rice ball around the filling. Roll in breadcrumbs and place on a plate. Form 30 balls doing this method.

title: Peppers Stuffed with Rice
description: Rinse bell peppers and cut off lids (set them aside). Remove seeds and ribs and pat dry, season with salt inside and out. Cut bacon into small cubes. Cut cheese into small cubes. Heat butter in a pan. Cook bacon for a few minutes, add onion and mushrooms and saute for about 5 minutes, stirring. Add broth and sambal oelek, season with oregano and thyme.

title: Rice with Fruits
description: Stick peaches and pears alternately on skewers. Brush the strawberries, remove the greens and mash together with the peach juice. Drain the rice well and pour into small bowl. Spread the puree over the rice, Serve garnished with skewers and mint.

title: Saffron Risotto with Roasted Red Peppers and Wild Garlic
description: Heat the fat in a large pot and sauté the rice briefly. Stir in the saffron and about 1/2 of the vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer. Stir in the remaining vegetable broth in increments until the rice is cooked to al dente. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Wide Rice Noodles with Asian Vegetables
description: Cook the pasta according to package directions.

title: Baked Rice Balls
description: Rice should be easy to shape and not too soft. With moistened hands, form small balls. Dip rice balls in whisked egg whites and roll each in breadcrumbs. Fry in hot oil about 4-5 minutes, until golden brown. Drain on paper towels and serve.

title: Shrimp Coconut Curry Soup
description: Cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente, drain, rinse and drain.

title: Sushi Rice and Shrimp
description: With moistened hands, shape the rice into a long roll, cut 1cm (approximately 1/2-inch) thick slices and place on the leaves. Put some wasabi paste into the middle of the rice, top with some shrimp and garnish with nori strips.

title: Strawberry Risotto
description: Heat oil in a pan and saute shallots until translucent. Add rice and cook, stirring, until rice is translucent. Add half of wine and chopped strawberries.

title: Fried Rice Noodles
description: Heat a wok with peanut oil. Add the garlic and chile and fry for 3 minutes. Stir fry with the water chestnuts and the drained and chopped mushrooms for 1 minute. Add the noodles, shrimp and peas and fry another 2 minutes.

title: Asian Noodle Salad with Vegetables
description: Rinse the bell peppers, cut in half, remove seeds and ribs and cut into small cubes. Rinse the chilies, cut in half lengthwise, remove the seeds and ribs and very finely chop. Toast the peanuts in a dry pan until golden brown. Cut the glass noodles into pieces about 5 cm (approximately 2 inches) long. Cook in salted water until al dente, drain, and mix with the vegetables.

title: Vegetable Fried Rice
description: Rinse and trim the scallions and cut the white and light green part into rings. Rinse the peppers, cut in half, remove the seeds and cut into strips. Heat the oil in a frying pan or a wok. Add the snow peas, oyster mushrooms, spinach, peppers and scallions and stir-fry for 4-5 minutes. Add the rice wine, soy sauce and sesame oil. Add the corn and rice and season with salt. Serve sprinkled with toasted sesame seeds.

title: Rice with Chicken
description: Rinse green beans and cook in boiling salted water about 10 minutes. Drain and hold aside.

title: Lamb Biryani
description: Heat a tablespoon of ghee in a saucepan and saute the remaining  onions until soft. Rinse rice in a sieve under running water and add to the onions. Add twice the amount of salted water as rice, bring to a boil and simmer on low heat for about 5 minutes. Cover the pan and remove from the heat.

title: Asparagus Risotto
description: Rinse asparagus, peel only the lower third, trim the ends and cut into bite-size pieces.

title: Risotto with Salmon Skewers
description: Rinse bell peppers, cut in half, remove seeds and cut into about 3 cm pieces (approximately 1 inch). Peel onion and cut into thick slices. Add vegetables alternately with salmon pieces on four wooden skewers.

title: Bean Risotto
description: Gradually add the broth, stirring and only adding more broth after it's been absorbed. Add the beans, and continue stirring until the rice is tender, about 20 minutes. Add rthe emaining ingredients, season with salt and pepper, serve in bowls sprinkled with Parmesan.

title: Rice Pilaf
description: Meanwhile rinse apricots and drop into boiling water for a few seconds, then drain. Peel and cut into fine strips. Add raisins, curry powder, turmeric and remaining butter to rice and mix. Continue to cook over very low heat for a few minutes until rice is al dente. To serve, spoon rice onto plates and top with nuts.

title: Spicy Turkey Meatball Skewers
description: Mix in chile, mango and cilantro. Season with pepper. With wet hands, form mixture into small meatballs. Thread several meatballs on each skewer. Bake in a preheated oven at 200°C (approximately 400°F), turning once halfway through baking time, about 10 minutes. Cook noodles according to package instructions. Divide noodles among plates and serve with skewers.

title: Banana Leaves with Rice Stuffing
description: Prepare filling. Rinse and dry scallions, chop finely. Rinse peppers, halve and remove seeds and ribs. Cut into small cubes. Peel and finely chop ginger and garlic.

title: Chicken and Rice Pilaf
description: Cut chicken breast fillets and liver in about 15 mm (approximately 1/2-inch) wide strips or cubes. Heat the oil in a skillet and sauté the garlic for a minute. Add the chicken and liver and saute, stirring to coat. Add the rice, pour in the remaining broth along with the peas and cook over low heat until the chicken and liver are cooked through, about 10 minutes. Add the saffron and season with salt and pepper.

title: Paella
description: Rinse mussels. Peel garlic and chop finely.

title: Roast Duck with Rice and Dried Fruit Stuffing
description: Preheat the oven to 180°C (approximately 350°F).  Peel and finely dice the onions. Heat 4 tablespoons oil in a skillet. Halve the apricots lengthwise and saute with the raisins and the onions until translucent, about 15 minutes.  Add salt, chile and garlic and cook 5 minutes longer.  Season with pepper. Stuff the duck with 3/4 of the onion-fruit filling and close the opening with small wooden skewers. In a roasting pan with a lid, saute the duck until golden brown all over, cover and cook over low heat for 15 minutes.

title: Spring Rolls
description: Add the shrimp and pork to the pan, together with the marinade. Add soy sauce, sherry (or rice wine) and cook 5 minutes. Season the filling mixture with salt and pepper, pour into a colander, drain, and let cool completely. Whisk the eggs and coat the edges of the individual dough sheets and place two together on top of each other. Place 2-3 tablespoons filling on each double dough sheet. Turn in the ends, and roll up around the filling. Fry the spring rolls in hot oil in portions until golden brown. Serve with sweet and sour sauce.

title: Baked Vegetable Rice with Cheese
description: Drain the pineapple well. Rinse the tomatoes, blanch, rinse with cold water, peel, quarter, core and dice the pulp. Drain the corn. Rinse the salmon, pat dry and chop. Mix the pineapple, tomatoes, corn and chopped salmon with the cooked rice.

title: Rice Salad with Peppers and Cheese
description: Mix oil with vinegar and season with salt and pepper. Pour mixture over rice and stir in thyme and peppers. Let cool and season to taste. Just before serving, sprinkle rice with cheese.

title: Radicchio Risotto
description: Heat 1 tablespoon butter in a wide saucepan and saute the onion and radicchio in it briefly. Add the arborio rice, pour in the white wine and let evaporate. Gradually pour in the beef broth and simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. The rice should be cooked but still al dente. Stir in the remaining butter and the Parmesan into the risotto, and season with salt and pepper.

title: Risotto with Cockles and Guinea Fowl
description: Meanwhile, season the guinea fowl with salt and pepper. Place flour, beaten eggs and sesame seeds each into separate dishes. Dredge the guinea fowl in flour, then eggs and then sesame seeds. Cook in hot oil over medium heat until golden brown. To serve, place the cooked risotto on plates, surround with cockles place the guinea fowl on top of the risotto.

title: Rice with Peas and Ham
description: Thaw peas. Cut ham into small cubes. Rinse parsley, shake dry and finely chop leaves.

title: Risotto with Chanterelles
description: Continue cooking until rice is al dente, about 20 minutes.

title: Spiced Rice with Vegetables
description: Combine saffron and 3 tablespoons boiling water in a bowl. Peel carrots and slice on the diagonal. Rinse, drain and divide cauliflower into florets. Peel and finely slice onion. Cut baby corn cobs in half.

title: Indonesian Coconut Rice
description: Mix coconut milk, salt and water. Strain through a sieve and bring to a boil.

title: Thai-Inspired Vegetables and Rice Noodles
description: Rinse the bok choy and cut into bite-size pieces. Rinse the scallions and cut into bite-size pieces. Rinse and trim the green beans. Cook in a pot of boiling salted water for 1 minute. Rinse and trim the snowpeas.

title: Cuttlefish Vegetable Fried Rice
description: Rinse the cuttlefish. Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add the cuttlefish and cook for 1 minutes. Remove and allow to drain.

title: Tofu-Vegetable Stir-Fry with Chinese Noodles
description: Peel and finely chop the garlic.

title: Roasted Red Pepper Risotto
description: For the peppers: Rinse the bell peppers, cut in half and remove the ribs and seeds. Place cut side down on a baking sheet and into an oven preheated to 220°C (approximately 425°F) until the skin is blackened and blistered. Transfer the pepper to a bowl, cover with plastic wrap and let cool slightly. Remove the blackened skin with the back of a knife or damp cloth and cut into 1.5 cm (approximately 1/2 inch) squares.

title: Rice Noodles with Vegetables and Coconut
description: Rinse the vegetables. Cut the bok choy and scallions into bite-size pieces. Blanch the green beans in a pot of boiling salted water for 1 minute, drain. Place the scallions, bok choy, beans and snow peas in one or two oiled bamboo steamers set over a wok or pan of simmering water, cover and cook 8 minutes.

title: Shrimp Fried Rice
description: Meanwhile, rinse the meat, pat dry and cut against the grain into thin strips and roll up. Peel the shallots and garlic and chop finely. Crush the shrimp paste with the back of a spoon.

title: Noodles with Tofu
description: Rinse chilies, cut in half, remove seeds and ribs and cut into thin strips.

title: Seafood Rice Wiht Shrimp and Squid
description: Cut the squid into 1 cm (approximately 1/2-inch) thick rings. Rinse peppers, cut in half, remove seeds and the white ribs and cut into diamonds of about 1.5 cm (approximately 3/4-inch) length. Rinse chile, halve lengthwise, remove the seeds and white ribs and finely chop. Peel garlic and chop finely.

title: Stir-Fried Rice with Vegetables and Chicken
description: Slit leek lengthwise, rinse thoroughly to remove grit, and slice crosswise into thin rings.

title: Rice Noodles with Bok Choy
description: Put noodles in warm water for 30 minutes. Drain and cook in plenty of water according to package instructions. Combine with bok choy. Transfer to plates, drizzle with lime juice and serve, garnished with lime wedges, immediately.

title: Spring Rolls
description: For the sauce, peel garlic and chop coarsely. Rinse chile, remove seeds and puree along with peanuts, sugar, lemon juice, ketchup and creme fraiche.

title: Cabbage Stuffed with Rice
description: Combine rice with pepper, corn and beans. Place cabbage leaves on flat surface, fill with rice mixture, drizzle wtih lemon juice and seson with salt and pepper.  Fold leaves from opposite sides and make rolls. Place stuffed cabagge rolls onto steamer. Boil about 2 cm (approximately 1 inch) of water, put steamer in place and cook for about 10 minutes.

title: Fried Rice with Chickpeas
description: Cook carrots, scallions, apricots, cashews and almonds in a skillet in hot oil for about 10 minutes and season with cumin salt and pepper. Remove dried spices from cooked rice. Add rice, ginger and drained chickpeas and cook over low heat for about 5 minutes. Season to taste. Mix together yogurt and chopped mint. Season to taste. Place yogurt on the rice and serve. If desired, garnish with mint.

title: Rice and Cheese Stuffed Zucchini
description: Peel the onions and garlic and finely chop. Heat some olive oil and cook the onions and garlic until soft, remove from the heat, transfer to a bowl and let cool. Add the rice, stir in the cheese and season with salt and pepper.

title: Duck Rice Paper Wraps
description: Mix 1 tablespoon of wine with 1 pinch of salt. Mix 1 tablespoon of cornstarch with a little water until smooth and mix into the wine. Pour over the duck and turn the meat several times.

title: Lemon Risotto
description: Melt half of the butter in a large pan. Sauté the onion, garlic and a few pieces of the lemon zest until softened. Add the rice and sauté briefly. Stir in the white wine and 3 tablespoons of lemon juice and cook until the liquid has been absorbed. Lower the heat to medium and stir in a bit of the chicken broth.

title: Vegetable Rice with Crab Meat
description: Drain the rice in a colander, rinse with cold water and drain.

title: Spiced Rice
description: Saute onion and carrot in hot oil in a saute pan. Rinse rice and add to pan. Saute for about 3 minutes.

title: Chicken and Rice Salad with Mango
description: Rinse the rice and cook in boiling chicken broth in a pot until al dente. Drain the rice and set aside.

title: Turkey and Fruit Rice Salad
description: Peel the mango, cut the flesh from the core and chop. Peel and chop kiwi. Rinse and quarter the tomatoes, remove the seeds and chop. Thaw the peas and blanch in boiling salted water for 3 minutes. Drain, rinse with cold water and drain again.

title: Vegetable and Rice-Filled Squash
description: Peel and finely chop the onions. Rinse the tomatoes, remove seeds and quarter. Mix together the onions, tomatoes, drained chickpeas and rice, season with salt and pepper and mix in the cheese. Fill the squash with the mixture, put in a shallow baking dish and cover with slices of butter. Pour in the broth and bake in a preheated oven at 350°F for about 45 minutes.

title: Rice Pudding Strawberry Pie
description: For the filling: Place the milk in a saucepan, add the rice and lemon zest and bring to a boil. Reduce to a simmer and cook on low heat until the rice is tender, about 20 minutes. Remove from the heat and let the rice soak for another 20 minutes. Cool to room temperature.
types: ['strawberry torte', 'Berry Cake', 'Berry torte', 'Strawberry dessert', 'Fruit', 'cake or tart with fruit', 'Rice', 'Cream Cake', 'tart', 'festively']

title: Guinea Hen with Noodles
description: Add the herbs, juniper berries, ginger, lemon juice and lemon zest to the pan and simmer over low heat for 30 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. In a bowl, stir together the cornstarch and a little cokd water until smooth. Stir the cornstarch mixture into the pan bring to a boil and cook, stirring until lightly thickened, about 1 minute. Stir in the creme fraiche. Cook the rice noodles according to package directions and drain. Serve with the guinea hen.

title: Rice and Vegetable Salad
description: Blanch and peel the tomatoes, remove the seeds and dice.

title: Stuffed Tomatoes
description: For the filling, cook the rice with the vegetable stock in a covered pot for about 20 minutes. Rinse and cut the carrots and peppers into small cubes. Peel the garlic and the onion and chop finely. Melt the butter in a saucepan and saute the onion and garlic briefly. Add the peppers, carrots, and tomatoes. Rinse the parsley and shake dry. Finely chop the leaves. From the mozzarella balls, cut four thin slices. Dice the remaining mozzarella. Mix the rice, the mozzarella, parsley, and vegetables. Fill each tomato with the rice mixture. Cover each half of the tomato with a slice of mozzarella and the lid of the tomato. Sprinkle with olive oil and place in a greased baking dish.

title: Paella
description: Cook the peas and in lightly salted water for about 5 minutes, drain, rinse with cold water and drain.

title: Vegetable Rice
description: Add wine and broth to pot. Season with salt and pepper. Cook the risotto in a preheated oven at 200°C (about 400°F) for about 1 hour. When the rice is tender, stir in butter and Parmesan. Mix in the herbs just before serving, with more herbs as a garnish.

title: Paella
description: Heat 5 tablespoons olive oil in a large, deep frying pan and saute the onion until soft. Add the peppers. Brown everything lightly, while stirring, season with salt and pepper and add the pressed garlic. Add the tomatoes and 1/2 liter (approximately 2 cups) of broth and simmer, uncovered, 10 more minutes. Then add the remaining 1/2 liter (approximately 2 cups) broth and simmer for 10 more minutes.

title: Rice with Fried Plantain
description: Heat the remaining oil in a pan and cook the plantain slices until crispy, turning several times. Top rice with plantain before serving.
types: ['Rice', 'Fruit', 'Side Dish', 'Cooking on vacation', 'American', 'Latin America', 'Central America', 'Caribbean', 'Cuban', 'South America']

title: Rice with Chicken and Yogurt Sauce
description: Mix the rice with chicken, pineapple and banana slices, onion, chile, ginger and curry. Fold in the salad dressing to taste, arrange on plates and serve.

title: Shrimp and Vegetables with Rice
description: Cook the rice according to package directions.

title: Rice Salad with Crawfish
description: Mix 2 tablespoons chicken broth, lemon juice, cumin, salt and pepper with the rice. Chop the parsley finely, then mix in.

title: Oriental Rice Pudding
description: Bring the rice and milk to a boil with a pinch of salt, lower the heat, cover and cook over low heat until the rice is soft and the liquid has been absorbed.

title: Fried Rice with Vegetables
description: Wash all of the vegetables except for the peas, trim and cut into long, thin strips.

title: Rice and Mussel Salad
description: Rinse lemon and cut into small cubes, set aside.

title: Nasi Goreng
description: Rinse and pat dry chicken, cut into thin strips.

title: Deep-Fried Rice Balls with Chicken Filling
description: Cut chicken into cubes. Heat oil and remaining butter in a pan and cook the chicken cubes on medium-high heat briefly. Season with salt, pepper and basil.

title: Good Luck Summer Rolls
description: Peel the carrots and cut into thin, wide strips.

title: Strawberry-Rice Pudding Bombe
description: Soak 4 gelatin leaves in cold water. Rinse and hull the strawberries and set some aside for garnish. Cut half of the remaining strawberries in pieces, puree the other half. Dissolve the soaking wet gelatin in a saucepan and stir into the pureed strawberries. Refrigerate until the puree has started to gel. Lift the vanilla bean and lemon zest from the rice and stir in the sugar.
types: ['Berry Cake', 'Berry torte', 'Strawberry dessert', 'strawberry torte', 'Fruit', 'cake or tart with fruit', 'Rice', 'tart']

title: Rice Noodles with Duck Breast and Shrimp
description: Mix together soybean oil, scallions, cilantro, mint, lime juice, orange juice, duck breast and shrimp. Allow to stand briefly, then pour over the warm noodles.

title: Rice Salad With Tuna
description: Rinse tomatoes and cut into wedges. Peel onion and cut into small cubes.

title: Stuffed Tomatoes with Rice
description: Thaw the peas. Cut the ham into small squares. Rinse the cherry tomatoes and cut into halves or quarters. Rinse the parsley, shake dry and chop the leaves finely.

title: Shrimp and Rice
description: Cook the rice according to package directions, stir in curry powder and season with salt and pepper.

title: Paella
description: In a pot, bring the fish broth to a boil. Add the clams, cover and cook until opened, about 5 minutes. Throw away any that don't open.

title: Paella
description: Rinse bell peppers, cut in half, remove seeds and ribs and cut into strips.

title: Risotto with Radicchio and Fennel
description: Heat olive oil and 1 tablespoon butter in a hot pot and saute onion and fennel until translucent over medium heat for about 3-4 minutes.

title: Coconut Rice Pudding with Apricots
description: Soak the gelatin in cold water. Remove cinnamon stick and lemon peel from the rice pudding. Allow to cool slightly. Squeeze out the gelatin and dissolve in the rice pudding. Chill rice pudding until set. Whip the cream with vanilla sugar and fold into the rice pudding.

title: Wild Rice Salad with Herbs
description: Sauté oyster mushrooms in butter and cool slightly. Sort and rinse raspberries. Mix raspberry vinegar with oil and season with salt, pepper and sugar.

title: Autumnal Mushroom Risotto
description: Pour in hot chicken broth. Cook uncovered over low heat for about 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. After half of the cooking time, add the mushrooms and gently mix in. Serve sprinkled with marjoram and basil leaves.

title: Rice Pudding with Berries
description: Rinse lemon half, wipe dry and zest. Add zest to egg yolks. Fold rice and egg whites into yolks.

title: Rice Soup in a Pumpkin
description: Melt butter in a saucepan and sauté diced pumpkin and tomatoes. Add broth to pumpkin mixture, bring to a boil, add brown rice pouch and simmer over low heat for about 15 minutes.

title: Sweet Rice Rings with Berries
description: Remove vanilla bean from rice. Let rice cool slightly, spoon into four small greased ring molds and press gently. Invert molds and remove rice rings onto serving plates. Rinse berries and pluck or hull as necessary. Rinse star fruit and lime and cut into slices.

title: Rice Blinis with Smoked Salmon and Caviar
description: Heat oil in a large skillet. Fry rice in portions into 12 blinis until browned and crispy on both sides. Cut smoked salmon into strips.

title: Vegetable Ragout with Gorgonzola Sauce over Wild Rice
description: Heat olive oil and butter in a large non-stick pan. Add carrots and sauté 6-8 minutes. Add remaining vegetables and sprouts and cook, stirring occasionally, 4-6 minutes more. Press garlic through a garlic press into the pan. Season with salt, pepper and lime juice.

title: Herb Risotto with Shrimp
description: Rinse herbs, shake dry and pluck off the leaves. Chop finely.

title: Rice with Vegetables
description: Rinse chile peppers, trim and cut into rings. Heat oil in a wok or large frying pan, and garlic and prepared vegetables and sauté for about 3 minutes while stirring. Add rice, sprouts and chile peppers and stir-fry for another 3 minutes. Season with fish sauce, soy sauce and sugar. Serve immediately.

title: Garlic Chicken Noodle Bowl
description: Dip rice noodles briefly in boiling water and drain. In a large pan, heat chicken broth and add sugar, fish sauce, curry paste, radish, peppers, green onions, celery and bring to a boil. Add chicken to pan and remove pan from heat and let stand for about 4 minutes. To serve, place rice noodles and garlic in four bowls and ladle hot soup over noodles and garlic.

title: Eggplant Curry with Rice and Yogurt Sauce
description: Heat the ghee in a saucepan and add the cinnamon, cardamom, cloves and bay leaves. Cook for about 2 minutes, until very fragrant. Add the rice and raisins add sauté for another 3 minutes. Add the saffron, almonds, cashews, pine nuts and sugar. Pour in 1 liter (approximately 4 cups) of water, season with salt, bring to a boil, cover, then simmer over low heat for about 20 minutes.

title: Risotto with Peas and Fried Shrimp
description: Bring broth to a boil in a small pot, then reduce heat and keep warm. Heat oil in a pot over medium heat and sauté scallions and garlic. Add rice and cook briefly. Ladle in about 150 ml (approximately 3/4 cup) of hot broth and cook, stirring frequently, until almost all liquid is absorbed. Continue to add broth in this manner and cook until rice is al dente, about 20 minutes, stirring frequently.

title: Asian Rice and Vegetable Soup
description: Pour the broth into a pot and bring to a boil. Add the vegetables, chile and ginger, and the rice, cover and simmer until the rice is tender, about 20 minutes.  Rinse the cilantro, shake dry, chop and add to the soup. Season with rice wine, soy sauce, salt and pepper.

title: Chicken with Rice and Tomatoes
description: Sweat the shallot in olive oil until translucent. Press the garlic. Add the garlic, bay leaf, chopped tomatoes and tomato paste and mix well. Season with salt and pepper. Simmer for approximately 15 minutes, stir in the rice and simmer for a few more minutes.

title: Nasi Goreng
description: Peel carrot, rinse cabbage.

title: Risotto with Zucchini
description: Add lemon zest and juice.Aadd sherry and stir. Saute zucchini, mushrooms and peas in remaining butter, add to risotto and cook, covered, for about 8-10 minutes. Add proscuitto and thyme. Arrange on plates and serve sprinkled with Parmesan and garnished with lemon wedges.

title: Seafood and Vegetable Paella
description: Peel onion and garlic and coarsely chop. Rinse bell pepper, cut in half, remove seeds and cut into strips. Peel tomato, cut in half, remove seeds and dice. Cut chicken breasts into bite-sized slices. Rinse clams. Heat 5 tablespoons olive oil in a large, deep frying pan and fry onion until soft. Add bell peppers, fry while stirring until lightly browned and season with salt and pepper. Add pressed garlic.

title: Fish Dumplings with Vegetable Rice and Curry Sauce
description: Rinse parsley, shake dry and pluck off the leaves and chop finely.

title: Cake with Apricot and Rice Filling
description: Refrigerate the dough in the pan. Cover and refrigerate the remaining dough. Drain the apricots in a sieve. Toast the almonds briefly in a dry pan, then pour out onto a plate. Separate the eggs. Beat the egg whites. Beat the butter, honey, egg yolks and liqueur until creamy. Stir in the almonds and the rice.

title: Brown Rice with Soy Sauce Vegetables
description: Rinse broccoli, divide into florets and cook with the peas in boiling salted water for 4 -5 minutes. Lift out, rinse and drain. Season rice with soy sauce, salt and pepper. Mix in broccoli and peas and serve immediately.

title: Chocolate Rice Bars
description: Separate the eggs. Whip the egg whites with salt and lemon juice until stiff. Beat the egg yolks with butter and sugar until fluffy, stir in the rice and fold in the beaten egg whites. Spread half of the batter on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper into a rectangle about 20 x 30 cm (approximately 8 x 12 inches).

title: Peppers Stuffed with Mint Rice
description: Peel and dice the onion and garlic. Heat the olive oil. Sauté onion, garlic and pine nuts in it. Drain the rice and add it into the pan with the currants.

title: Turkey Cutlets with Banana Rice
description: Trim, rinse and cut the celery into small pieces. Trim and rinse the chile pepper, remove the seeds and cut into thin rings. Peel the banana and cut into slices. Drizzle the banana slices with lemon juice.

title: Roast Pork with Curry Sauce and Wild Rice
description: Stir the honey with soy sauce and oil and season with salt, pepper and cayenne pepper. After 40 minutes of roasting time, brush the pork with the mixture. Cook the rice according to the package directions.

title: Stuffed Zucchini in Lemon Sauce
description: Peel onion and garlic and finely chop. Heat oil and briefly saute with the meat. Finely chop the reserved zucchini pulp and add to the saute pan.

title: Pheasant with Mushrooms and Wild Rice
description: Rinse pheasants and pat dry. Cut breasts from bone and season pheasant with salt inside and out. Coat breasts with 30 grams (approximately 2 tablespoons) of softed butter and cover with slices of bacon, then place back on pheasant.
types: ['Main Course', 'with Alcohol', 'Milk', 'Eggs', 'Pheasant', 'Pork', 'Root Vegetable', 'Onion', 'Grain', 'Spices', 'Dairy', 'Stone Fruit', 'mushroom', 'Rice', 'Sauce', 'crowdpleaser', 'High-protein Poultry Dish', '600+ calorie', 'low-carb poultry', 'low-carb']

title: Curry Rice with Vegetables and Pineapple and Bananas
description: Peel the garlic. Heat the oil. Mince the garlic through a press into the oil. Add the vegetables and sauté for 15 minutes. Gradually pour the broth into the vegetables. Season with salt, pepper and lemon juice. Add the cream to the rice, stir to combine and warm for a few minutes. Add the vegetables to the rice.

title: Seafood Risotto
description: Bring broth to a boil in a small pot, then reduce heat and keep warm. Heat the oil in a heavy saucepan and sauté shallots and garlic until translucent. Add the carrots and leeks and saute 2 more minutes. Stir in the rice. Stir in the saffron. Add white wine and cook, stirring, until evaporated. Ladle in about 150 ml (approximately 3/4 cup) of hot broth and cook, stirring frequently, until almost all liquid is absorbed. Continue to add broth in this manner for 10 minutes.

title: Stuffed Cabbage with Lobster Filling
description: Chop lobster meat finely, mix in a bowl with creme fraiche, egg and breadcrumbs. Mix in half of the tarragon and season with salt and pepper. Fill Chinese cabbage leaves, roll up and place in a baking dish. Top with small pieces of butter and bake in preheated oven at 160°C (approximately 325°F) for about 20 minutes. Add a small amount of water to the baking dish if needed.

title: Rice Gratin with Mushroom Sauce
description: Rinse rice under running water in a colander and drain.

title: Risotto Slices with Vegetables
description: Pour the hot risotto in a small greased springform pan, flatten and leave to cool. Once cooled, remove the cake ring and divide the risotto cake into 6 pieces. Shortly before serving, preheat the oven to 200°C degrees (approximately 375°F).

title: Fried Rice with Chicken
description: Rinse the chicken, pat dry, and marinate with the chile sauce for about 20 minutes.

title: Paella
description: Peel onion and garlic and coarsely chop. Peel tomatoes, core and dice. Rinse mussels and peel 2/3 of shrimp. Rinse squid and chop. Heat 5 tablespoons olive oil in a large, deep frying pan, fry onion until soft and add pressed garlic. Pour in 1/2 liter broth and simmer, uncovered, for 10 more minutes. In a large paella pan, heat residual olive oil and fry rice, stirring briefly. Dissolve saffron in a few spoonfuls of hot broth, add remaining broth and onion mixture to rice, bring to a boil and then simmer for about 25 minutes.

title: Tomatoes Stuffed with Rice
description: Prepare tomato sauce. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté garlic with thyme. Add diced tomatoes and tomato paste and cook until tomato pieces are soft. Add 400 ml (approximately 1.5 cup) of water, season with salt and pepper and simmer for about 5 minutes. If necessary, season with salt and sugar. Puree in blender and strain through a sieve. Set aside.

title: Rice and Vegetable Skillet with Beef
description: Cook rice according to package instructions.

title: Jambalaya
description: Add spices, tomato paste, Worcestershire sauce, pepper strips and stock, then bring to a boil. Add rice, cover and cook for 20 to 30 minutes, until rice is soft.

title: Curried Rice Salad with Mango and Yogurt Sauce
description: Rinse and core the tomatoes and cut into cubes. Thinly slice the white and tender green of the scallions. In a large bowl, whisk together the yogurt, lemon juice and curry powder, season with salt and pepper.

title: Red Rice Salad Topped with Shrimp
description: Salt the herb water and pour in the rice. Cook the rice, covered, over low heat for about 45 minutes, until al dente. Drain and let cool. Remove the onion and herbs.

title: Asparagus Risotto with Scallops
description: Bake in a preheated oven until the cheese melts, bubbles and turns golden brown, about 5 minutes. Then remove from the baking sheet immediately, let cool briefly and remove from paper. Let cool on a wire rack until crispy and set.
types: ['Asparagus risotto', 'Classic', 'skillet dish', 'skillet rice dish', 'European', 'Italian', 'One-Pot', 'saltwater\xa0Fish', 'Sprout', 'Spices', 'Seafood', 'Shellfish', 'Dairy', 'Rice', 'Risotto', 'Dinner', 'Side Dish', 'Rice Side Dish', 'hearty side dish', 'Primi Piatti']

title: Paella
description: Blanch the tomatoes in boiling water briefly, drain, peel and chop.

title: Orzo-vegetable Casserole
description: Cook the orzo in plenty of salted water according to package directions until al dente.

title: Pork Curry with Coconut and Banana
description: Rinse, dry, and slice both the white and light green parts of the scallions.

title: Rice and Vegetable Casserole (Römertopf)
description: Rinse zucchini and cut into slices. After rice and vegetables have cooked 20 minutes, stir in zucchini.

title: Rice Salad with Shrimp and Mango
description: Heat oil in a pan and saute shrimp for about 4 minutes. Add garlic and cook for little bit more. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Seafood Risotto
description: Bring the broth to a boil in a small pot, then reduce heat and keep warm. Heat half the butter in a pot over medium heat and saute the onion, garlic, and lemon zest. Add rice and stir until rice is translucent and coated in butter. Add white wine and 3 tablespoons of lemon juice and cook, stirring, until evaporated. Ladle in about 150 ml (approximately 3/4 cup) of hot broth and cook, stirring frequently, until almost all liquid is absorbed. Continue to add broth in this manner and cook until rice is al dente, about 20 minutes, stirring frequently.

title: Rice Noodle Salad with Ginger Dressing
description: Pour boiling salted water over the rice noodles and let sit, 3 min. Strain and rinse with cold water, then drain and mix with the dressing.

title: Rice Bread
description: Mix brown rice flour with potato starch, rice bran, guar gum and salt. Add yeast, vinegar and 300 ml (approximately 1 1/4 cup) of lukewarm water and knead thoroughly.

title: Paella with Mussels and Chicken
description: Preheat the oven to 200°C (approximately 400°F). Peel the tomatoes and dice. Peel the onions and garlic, chop and sweat in the oil until softened. Add the tomatoes, rice, peas and peppers and sauté briefly. Dissolve the saffron and paprika in the broth, mix into the rice mixture and bring to a boil. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Baked Rice Balls with Shrimp
description: For the breading, in a deep dish, whisk together the remaining egg. Form cooled rice into walnut-sized portions and roll into balls. Dust the balls in flour, dip in the egg and coat with the breadcrumbs.

title: Homemade Paella
description: For the broth: Rinse the chicken, pat dry, cut off wings and legs. Separate wingtips and divide legs at the joint. Fillet breasts, halve, skin everything and add skin along with wing tips and carcass in a pot. Peel onion, carrot and celery, trim and roughly chop. Add together with peppercorns, cloves and bay leaf to the pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil and let boil gently for about 45 minutes. Then pour through a sieve, degrease and add saffron.

title: Baby Corn and Rice Salad
description: Combine all prepared salad ingredients. Mix vinegar and oil, season with salt and pepper. Drizzle salad with dressing and serve.
types: ['Potato Salad', 'Summer Salad', 'Party', 'Vegetable', 'Root Vegetable', 'Rice', 'Party Salad', 'Rice Salad', 'Side Dish', 'Side Salad']

title: Seafood Risotto
description: Rinse the mussels, remove the beards and clean thoroughly. Rinse the squid and the shrimp and pat dry. Add the mussels and the squid to the rice during the last 10 minutes of cooking. Add the shrimp during the last 5 minutes of cooking and adding more broth if necessary.

title: Risotto with Broccoli
description: Meanwhile grate cheese. Rinse broccoli (if desired) and divide up florets. Boil florets in salted water for 3-5 minutes until al dente.

title: Vegetable Rice Paper Rolls
description: Rinse cucumber, cut in half lengthwise and remove seeds. Peel carrot. Rinse and halve the peppers, removing seeds and ribs. Rinse and trim scallions. Cut the all vegetables in approximately 10 cm (approximately 4 inch) long strips. Rinse the cilantro leaves and shake dry.

title: Rice and Vegetable Salad
description: Peel carrots, trim both ends and grate coarsely. Rinse parsley, shake dry, pluck leaves and chop finely. Cut mint leaves into thin strips. Rinse orange in hot water, pat dry and grate zest. Squeeze out orange juice.

title: Risotto with Shrimp and Asparagus
description: Peel and finely chop onion and garlic. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil and sauté. Add rice and saute until translucent. Add wine and cook, stirring, until wine is absorbed. Add some of asparagus water until rice is just covered and cook, stirring frequently, until almost all liquid is absorbed. Continue to add asparagus water in this manner and cook until rice is al dente, about 20 minutes, stirring frequently.

title: Ossobuco
description: Heat the oil in a roasting pan. Brown the meat all around quickly and take out. Add the onion and garlic in the fried fat, sauté, stir in the tomato paste, sauté briefly and deglaze with about 100 ml of wine. Bring to a boil. Pour the wine and boil again. Repeat this process three times. Add the remaining wine with the same amount of broth ensuring the meat is covered. Simmer over a low heat for about 70 minutes. Pour the broth every now and again.

title: Stewed Rice with Chicken
description: Peel onions and garlic and dice finely. Rinse and halve bell peppers, remove seeds and ribs and cut into small cubes. Dice bacon finely. Saute bacon in remaining oil in the pot. Add prepared vegetables and saute for 1-2 minutes. Add well-drained olives and rice, mix well. Add broth, sprinkle with saffron and season with salt and pepper, return chicken to the pot. Cook, covered, in preheated oven at 180°C (approximately 350°F) for about 30 minutes.

title: Cheese Stuffed Rice Balls
description: For breading, whisk in a deep dish the remaining egg, salt and pepper. Cut the cheese into small cubes.

title: Rice-Bean Soup
description: Pour in approximately 800 ml (approximately 3 1/3 cups of water), bring to a boil and add the rice and beans. Cover and simmer 35-40 minutes. Season with salt and lemon juice. Spoon into warmed bowls and serve garnished with cilantro.

title: Beetroot Risotto with Thyme
description: Add the sunflower oil and 1 tablespoon butter in a hot pot and saute the onions in it until translucent. Add the arborio rice and also saute briefly. Add the beetroot and pour the red wine. Pour a little broth to cover the rice, and season with salt and pepper. Continue adding the broth with occasional stirring until the rice and beetroot are cooked and the rice still has slight bite, about 15-20 minutes.

title: Almond Rice Pudding with Cherries
description: For the compote: rinse and pit cherries. Combine cornstarch with 2-3 tablespoons of juice, mix until smooth. Boil remaining juice with sugar and lemon juice. Add cherries and simmer for about 5 minutes. Add cornstarch and cook unitl it thickens. Remove from heat and let cool.

title: Spice Rice
description: Heat the chicken broth, cloves, cardamom and turmeric in a large saucepan. Drain the rice and add to the broth. Boil over low heat. Simmer for 15 minutes, covered. Clamp a folded paper towel between the pot and cover. Take the rice off the stove and let sit for 5 minutes. Stir in the cashews, season to taste. Serve with a yogurt dip.

title: Rice Noodles with Spicy Turkey Meatball Sauce
description: Rinse and string the snow peas and halve crosswise. Place the noodles in a bowl, pour hot water over to cover and let stand until softened, about 4 minutes. Drain.

title: Risotto with Pumpkin
description: Bring broth to a boil in a small pot, then reduce heat and keep warm. Heat oil in a pot over medium heat and sauté onion and garlic. Add rice and stir to coat with oil. Add white wine and cook, stirring, until evaporated.

title: Colorful Mixed Meat Stew with Rice and Vegetables
description: Brown the pork belly in hot oil in a pan. Add the chicken and the sausage and cook briefly. Add the chile pepper, onion and garlic to the pan and saute together for 1-2 minutes. Stir in the pepper, the bay leaf and celery with the rice and deglaze everything with the wine. Pour in the broth and add the tomatoes, season with salt and pepper, cover and simmer gently for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the shrimp, corn (thawed or drained) and the mussels during the last 8-10 minutes of cooking. Remove and discard any unopened mussels.

title: Classic Risotto
description: Heat olive oil and 1 tablespoon butter in a pot and saute the onions in it until translucent. Add the arborio rice and saute briefly. Pour in some broth such that the rice is completely covered with it. Pour in the broth repeatedly, while stirring occasionally, and cook for 15-20 minutes until the risotto gets a creamy consistency and the rice is cooked al dente. Finally, stir in the remaining butter and season with salt and pepper. Stir in the grated Parmesan, and transfer the risotto to plates.

title: Risotto with Artichokes
description: Peel the onion and chop finely. Dice the tomatoes.

title: Eggplants Stuffed with Rice
description: Chop pulp and sprinkle with a little lemon juice. Peel onion and garlic and chop finely. Heat 1-2 tablespoons of oil in a pan and saute onion and garlic until transucent. Add eggplant cubes and saute until lightly browned. Season with salt and pepper and remove from heat.

title: Baked Rice Balls
description: Rinse and chop the scallions. Peel the shallot and finely chop. Sweat both scallions and shallot in a pan with butter. Add the rice, mix and sauté for 2-3 minutes. Pour in the wine and let it boil. Cover the rice with some asparagus broth.  Leave for 15-20 minutes until the rice cooked with a slight bite. Remove from the heat, stir in the parmesan and let cool.

title: Shrimp and Rice Salad
description: Rinse the shrimp, pat dry, season with salt and pepper and sauté briefly in a pan with 1 tablespoon hot oil. Remove from the heat and leave until cooked throughout.

title: Vegetarian Meatloaf
description: Preheat the oven to 180°C (approximately 350°F). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

title: Rice Mushroom Salad with Bacon
description: Clean mushrooms and cut into thin slices. Cut bacon into strips. Peel and quarter onion, cut into strips.

title: Peppers Stuffed with Ground Meat
description: Rinse peppers and cut off tops.

title: Rice with Vegetables
description: Rinse the broccoli and drain. Peel the carrots and finely grate. Place carrots and broccoli in the boiling broth and cook for about 6-8 minutes until soft. Then crush with the potato masher and stir in the rice. Season and serve with lemon juice and a little salt.

title: Rice Pudding for Babies
description: Rinse and halve peaches, remove the pit and chop coarsely. Puree along with orange juice.  Mix peach puree with the rice pudding, let cool as needed and serve..

title: Fennel Risotto
description: Meanwhile heat the remaining oil in a skillet and saute the sliced ​​fennel stirring occasionally until tender, 6-8 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Split the vanilla bean lengthwise and scrape out the seeds. Rinse the lemon, pat dry, grate the zest and then squeeze out the juice. Add approximately 60 grams (approximately 2 ounces) Parmesan, the vanilla seeds, ricotta, the lemon zest and the remaining butter to the risotto and season with lemon juice, salt and pepper. Spread the finished risotto on four plates. Garnish with the fried fennel, the remaining Parmesan and fennel fronds. Serve as desired with ciabatta and tapenade.

title: Rice Salad with Duck Breast
description: Rinse duck, pat dry and score skin in diamond pattern. Heat oil in a pan. Cook duck, skin side down, for about 5 minutes or until browned. Turn meat over and cook on another side for about 2 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Put in a roasting pan and bake in preheated oven at 180°C (approximately 350°F) for 10-12 minutes, duck should be pink inside. Wrap in aluminum foil and let rest.Toast almonds in a dry pan until golden yellow. Remove from heat and cool. Remove seeds from pomegranate. Rinse herbs, shake dry and chop. Combine rice with almonds, pomegranate seeds, lemon juice, herbs and oil. Cut duck breast into thin slices. Arrange rice salad on plates and top with duck breast slices. Garnish with mango slices, if desired. Serve.

title: Onions Filled with Ground Meat
description: Preheat the oven to 180°C (approximately 350°F).

description: Rinse tomatoes and dice finely, taking care to remove seeds. Rinse basil, shake dry and chop finely.

Add the rice to the pan and season with salt, pepper, some lime zest and juice. Stir in the shrimp and serve.

All at once, pour 150 ml (approximately 5 1/4 ounces) cold water into the rice flour mixture and stir until a smooth dough is formed. Dredge the shrimp balls into the dough allowing any excess to drip back into the bowl, and working in batches fry the shrimp balls until they're golden brown and bob to the surface about 5 minutes. title: Risotto with Mussels
description: Peel onion and garlic and finely dice both. Heat oil in a pan and saute onion and garlic until translucent. Add rice, saute, then add some broth, sprinkle with saffron and season with salt and pepper. Allow rice to absorb the liquid, cover again with some broth and continue stirring. Continue adding broth in this process until rice is cooked and creamy while still al dente (about 20 minutes). During the last 1-2 minutes, add mussels and chives and mix well.

title: Spanish Rice with Chorizo, Cockles and Eggs
description: Heat the olive oil in a large, ovenproof pot. Sauté the bell peppers, shallots, chorizo and chicken until browned. Add the saffron and rice and stir to combine. Season with salt, pepper and paprika. Pour in the white wine and enough water so that the rice is barely covered. Cover and cook for about 20 minutes over medium-low heat. The rice should have absorbed all of the liquid and be al dente. Preheat the oven to 200°C (approximately 400°F).

title: Leek and Blue Cheese Risotto
description: Heat the olive oil and butter in a large pot and sauté the leeks for 1-2 minutes, until softened. Add the rice to the pot and sauté briefly. Stir in the white wine and about half of the vegetable broth. Cover and simmer for about 20 minutes, stirring in a bit of the remaining vegetable broth every few minutes, until the rice is al dente.

title: Vegan Rice Pudding with Fruit
description: Heat the coconut milk with the sugar and the lime juice to boiling and boil while stirring until the sugar is dissolved. Take the steamed rice from the heat, stir into liquid and let absorb 10-15 minutes.

title: Indian Rice with Vegetables and Cherries
description: Heat the milk in a small saucepan and add the saffron and 1 teaspoon of ghee. Remove from the heat.

title: Tuna Summer Rolls
description: Peel the cucumber and julienne. Rinse the pepper, remove the stem, seeds and pith and cut into long strips. Peel the carrot and cut lengthwise into thin strips with a vegetable peeler. Rinse the lettuce, shake dry and cut into wide strips. Drain the tuna and flake.

title: Spicy Shrimp Rice
description: Rinse prawns and pat dry. Heat remaining oil in a pan and fry for 1-2 minutes on each side until golden brown. Add prawns to the pot and season to taste with parsley, lemon juice, salt and red pepper flakes.

title: Vegetarian Rice Noodle Soup with Tofu
description: Pour the oil in a heated pan and fry the ginger, garlic, lemongrass and scallion greens over medium heat for 3-4 minutes. Then pour in 1 liter (approximately 1 quart) of water, add half the cilantro leaves and both lime leaves and simmer for 15-20 minutes.

title: Coconut Shrimp on Rice Noodles
description: Rinse shrimp and pat dry. Rinse lemongrass, trim and cut into thin rings. Peel garlic and ginger and finely chop. Trim mushrooms and cut into strips.

title: Risotto with Leek and Smoked Trout
description: Add butter and Parmesan cheese to risotto and season to taste.

title: Coconut Rice Soup with Egg
description: Sauté the chopped spring onion with the ginger in some soybean oil. Add the rice and cook briefly. Pour in the coconut milk with about 500 ml of water (approximately 2 cups). Season with salt and bring to a boil again.

title: Rice Paper Vegetable Rolls
description: Fill a shallow dish, slightly larger than the sheets of rice paper, with water. In addition, spread a cloth on a work surface and have a second cloth handy. Place sheets one at a time into the water and soak for about 1 minute. Then gently spread on the cloth and pat dry with the second cloth.

title: Thai Noodle Tofu Pan with Nuts and Egg
description: Whisk eggs in a bowl with 1 tablespoon soy sauce. Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a pan, add egg mixture and let thicken for about 2 minutes. Fry an additional 1-2 minutes, then remove from pan and cut into strips. Heat remaining oil in a pan and fry tofu cubes. Add chili pepper, garlic, ginger and scallions and fry for about 1 minute. Add noodles, bean sprouts and egg strips and allow to warm. Season with soy sauce and lime juice. Divide between bowls, sprinkle with nuts and serve garnished with cilantro.

title: Wild Rice Salad with Garlic-Flavored Mushrooms
description: Toast almonds in a dry frying pan until fragrant. Remove from pan and chop coarsely. Coarsely chop berries. Peel and finely chop onion. Rinse herbs, shake dry and chop leaves.

title: Colorful Rice Cake
description: Set up a steamer and line it with a cheesecloth. Place half of one color of dough into the steamer nd cover with another cheesecloth. Cook for 10 minutes, then add half of another colored dough. Repeat process until there are 8 colored layers of cake. Remove cake out from steam and let cool completely in the refrigerator. Slice and serve.

title: Summer Rolls with Tofu and Vegetables
description: Peel the carrots and the cucumber. Halve the cucumber, scrape out the seeds and then cut both into thin sticks. Also, slice the tofu. Rinse and trim the bell pepper and cut into thin sticks. Rinse and trim the scallions, cut into pieces about 10 cm long (approximately 4 inches) and then cut into fine strips. Rinse the lettuce, shake dry and cut into strips. Rinse the herbs, shake dry and pluck off the leaves.

title: Spring Rolls with Duck, Radish and Grapefruit
description: Fill a shallow dish slightly larger than the rice paper sheets with water. Spread open a towel near the dish and have a second towel handy. One at a time, soak rice paper sheets in water about 1 minute. Gently spread soaked rice paper sheets on the open towel and pat dry with the second towel.

title: Rice Noodles with Bok Choy and Carrots
description: Carameliz the sugar in a saucepan, then add the penuts, peanut butter, and curry paste. Mix in the coconut milk and simmer for 10 minutes over medium heat.
